sentences.EN: This is my little brother, George.
So, Peppa and George cannot play outside.
sentences.CN: 所以佩奇和乔治不能在外边玩。

sentences.EN: Can we go out to play?
Peppa loves jumping in muddy puddles.
Peppa. If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，如果你要在泥坑里跳，你必须要穿上靴子才行。

sentences.EN: George likes to jump in muddy puddles, too.
sentences.CN: 乔治也喜欢在泥坑里跳。

sentences.EN: George. If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots.
sentences.CN: 乔治，如果你想在泥坑里跳，你必须穿上靴子才行。

sentences.EN: Peppa likes to look after her little brother, George.
sentences.CN: 佩奇喜欢照顾她的弟弟乔治。

sentences.EN: George, let's find some more puddles.
sentences.CN: 乔治，我们再去找几个泥坑跳吧。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。

sentences.EN: Peppa has found a little puddle.
sentences.CN: 佩奇找到了一个小泥坑。

sentences.EN: George has found a big puddle.
sentences.CN: 乔治找到了一个大泥坑。

sentences.EN: Look, George. There's a really big puddle.
sentences.CN: 你看，乔治。那里有一个很大的泥坑。

sentences.EN: George wants to jump into the big puddle first.
sentences.CN: 乔治想第一个跳到泥坑里去玩。

sentences.EN: Stop, George.I must check if it's safe for you.
sentences.CN: 等一下，乔治。我得检查一下这里安不安全。

sentences.EN: Good. It is safe for you.
sentences.CN: 很好，你可以放心地玩啦。(对你很安全)
对不起，乔治。只是些泥而已。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love jumping in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Come on, George. Let's go and show Daddy.
sentences.CN: 走，乔治。我们去给爸爸看看。

sentences.EN: Daddy. Daddy.Guess what we've been doing.
sentences.CN: 爸爸，爸爸，你猜猜我们刚才干了些什么。

sentences.EN: Have you just had a bath?
I know. You've been jumping in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 我知道了。你们刚才在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Yes. Yes. Daddy. We've been jumping in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 没错，没错，爸爸。我们刚才在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Ho. Ho. And look at the mess you're in.
sentences.CN: 呵呵，看看你们弄得多脏呀。

sentences.EN: Let's clean up quickly before Mummy sees the mess.
sentences.CN: 快清理干净，别让妈妈看到那么脏。（在妈妈看到前弄干净）

sentences.EN: Daddy, when we've cleaned up, will you and Mummy come and play, too?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，我们清理干净以后，你和妈妈也会一起来玩吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, we can all play in the garden.
sentences.CN: 是的，我们都可以在花园玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are wearing their boots.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治穿着他们的靴子。

sentences.EN: Mummy and Daddy are wearing their boots.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸也穿着他们的靴子。

sentences.EN: Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 佩奇喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 每个人都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Oh, Daddy pig, look at the mess you're in.
sentences.CN: 哦，猪爸爸，瞧瞧你身上多脏呀。
乔治最喜欢的玩具是恐龙先生。
乔治最喜欢恐龙先生了。

sentences.EN: Sometimes, George likes to scare Peppa with Mr.Dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 有时候，乔治喜欢用恐龙先生吓唬佩奇。
恐龙先生坐在乔治的身边。

sentences.EN: Was that you George, or was it Mr.Dinosaur?
sentences.CN: 是你吗乔治，还是恐龙先生？

sentences.EN: George shares his bath with Mr.Dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 乔治与恐龙先生一起洗澡。

sentences.EN: When George goes to bed,Mr.Dinosaur is tucked up with him.
sentences.CN: 乔治睡觉时，恐龙先生和他睡在一起。

sentences.EN: George's favourite game is throwing Mr.Dinosaur up in the air and catching him when he falls back down.
sentences.CN: 乔治最喜欢的游戏是把恐龙先生扔上天空然后在他掉下来时把他接住。

sentences.EN: Peppa and Daddy Pig are playing draughts.
sentences.CN: 佩奇正在和猪爸爸下国际跳棋。
乔治，你是不是把恐龙先生弄丢了？
乔治把恐龙先生弄丢了。
我们会找到恐龙先生的。

sentences.EN: It's a job for a detective.
A detective is a very important person who is good at finding things.
sentences.CN: 侦探是个非常厉害的人他们善长找到丢失的东西。

sentences.EN: Me. Me. I'm good at finding things.
sentences.CN: 我，我。我善长找到丢失的东西。
好吧。那佩奇就是侦探了。

sentences.EN: I will help you find Mr.Dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 我会帮你找到恐龙先生的。

sentences.EN: Maybe the detective should ask George some simple questions.
sentences.CN: 也许侦探小姐应该问乔治一些简单的问题。
乔治？恐龙先生在哪里呢？

sentences.EN: George does not know where Mr.Dinosaur is.
sentences.CN: 乔治不知道恐龙先生在哪里。

sentences.EN: The detective could try and guess where Mr.Dinosaur might be.
sentences.CN: 侦探小姐要猜猜恐龙先生可能在哪里。

sentences.EN: I know. I know where he is.
sentences.CN: 我知道。我知道他在哪了。

sentences.EN: George always has Mr.Dinosaur with him in the bath.
sentences.CN: 乔治总是在洗澡时让恐龙先生陪着

sentences.EN: So Mr.Dinosaur is in the bath.
sentences.CN: 所以恐龙先生在浴缸里。

sentences.EN: Mr.Dinosaur is not in the bath.

sentences.CN: 我知道恐龙先生在哪里了。

sentences.EN: George always has Mr.Dinosaur in his bed at night.
sentences.CN: 乔治总是在晚上睡觉时让恐龙先生陪着。

sentences.EN: Mr.Dinosaur is not in George's bed.
sentences.CN: 恐龙先生不在乔治的床上。

sentences.EN: Maybe we should try the garden.
sentences.CN: 也许我们应该去花园里找找。

sentences.EN: I was going to say that.
Mr.Dinosaur is very hard to find.
sentences.CN: 看来恐龙先生很难找到。
哦。哪里都没有恐龙先生。

sentences.EN: George? You do love to throw Mr.Dinosaur in the air...
sentences.CN: 乔治？你喜欢把恐龙先生扔上天空。。。

sentences.EN: I wonder if this time you threw Mr.Dinosaur just a bit too high.
sentences.CN: 我想这一次你是不是把恐龙先生扔得太高了一点。

sentences.EN: There he is. There he is.
You really are a very good detective.
sentences.CN: 你真是一个出色的侦探小姐。

sentences.EN: George is so happy to have Mr.Dinosaur back again.
sentences.CN: 找回了恐龙先生，乔治开心得不得了。

sentences.EN: Maybe it isn't a good idea to play with dinosaurs near trees.
sentences.CN: 也许在树附近和恐龙先生玩不是一个好主意。

sentences.EN: Peppa is waiting for her best friend, Suzy Sheep.
sentences.CN: 佩奇在等她最好的朋友，小羊苏茜。

sentences.EN: Suzy Sheep has come to play with Peppa.
sentences.CN: 小羊苏茜来找佩奇玩了。

sentences.EN: Peppa loves Suzy. Suzy loves Peppa.
sentences.CN: 佩奇喜欢苏茜。苏茜也喜欢佩奇。

sentences.EN: Peppa, why don't you and Suzy go and play in your bedroom?
sentences.CN: 佩奇，你为什么不与苏茜去你的卧室玩？

sentences.EN: Peppa and Suzy love playing in Peppa's bedroom.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和苏茜喜欢在佩奇的卧室玩。

sentences.EN: No, George.This game is just for big girls.
sentences.CN: 不行，乔治。这游戏只适合大女孩玩。

sentences.EN: Go and play with your own toys.
sentences.CN: 你去玩你自己的玩具吧。

sentences.EN: Peppa and Suzy want to play on their own.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和苏茜只想自己玩。

sentences.EN: I'm a tiny little fairy princess!
sentences.CN: 我是一个小小仙女公主！

sentences.EN: I'm going to wave my magic wand...and turn you into a frog!
sentences.CN: 我现在要挥动我的魔法棒了。。。然后把你变成青蛙！

sentences.EN: George doesn't like playing on his own.
sentences.CN: 乔治不喜欢自己一个人玩。

sentences.EN: No, George! I'm playing with Suzy...
sentences.CN: 不行，乔治！我正在和苏茜玩。。。

sentences.EN: You'll have to play somewhere else.
George wants to play with Peppa.
Someone needs to lick out the bowl.
George likes helping Mummy make cookies.
sentences.CN: 乔治喜欢帮妈妈做饼干。

sentences.EN: But he likes playing with Peppa more.
sentences.CN: 但他更想和佩奇一起玩。

sentences.EN: I want to be a nurse!
I want to be a doctor.
But who's gonna be the sick person?
Peppa and Suzy love playing doctors and nurses.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和苏茜喜欢扮演医生和护士。
佩奇听了下乔治的心脏。

sentences.EN: Now, George, take a big breath in...then cough.
sentences.CN: 现在，乔治，深吸一口气。。。然后咳嗽。

sentences.EN: Mm, I think your heart's a bit loose...
sentences.CN: 嗯，我觉得你的心跳有一点慢。。。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, you're very, very hot.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊，你的体温很高很高。

sentences.EN: I think you have to stay in bed for three years.
sentences.CN: 我想你得在床上躺上三年。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has come to find George.
Oh, no! What's wrong with George?
Don't worry, Daddy. It's only a game.
sentences.CN: 不要担心，爸爸。这只是个游戏而已。

sentences.EN: Can the patient have a visitor?
They're his medicine to make him feel better.
sentences.CN: 它们是能治好乔治的药。

sentences.EN: Then I think I need lots of cookies to make me better.
sentences.CN: 我想我需要很多的饼干让我好起来。

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family are visiting Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和家人去看望猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

sentences.EN: Hello, my little ones. Come inside,
sentences.CN: 你们好，我的小宝贝们。快点进来吧，

sentences.EN: Can you guess what it is?
It's not a dinosaur. Come and see.
sentences.CN: 它不是恐龙。快进来看看。

sentences.EN: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig have a pet parrot.
sentences.CN: 猪奶奶和猪爷爷养了一只宠物鹦鹉。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George, this is our pet parrot.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，这是我们的宠物鹦鹉。

sentences.EN: Mummy, why does Polly copy everything that Granny says?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，为什么奶奶说什么鹦鹉就跟着说什么呢？
这是因为鹦鹉会学人说话。
真是一只可爱的小鹦鹉！
真是一只可爱的小鹦鹉！
来吧，大家，下午茶的时间到了！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love eating chocolate cake.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢吃巧克力蛋糕。

sentences.EN: But today, they are in a hurry to get back and play with Polly Parrot.
sentences.CN: 但是今天，他们吃得很快想去和鹦鹉波利玩。

sentences.EN: What noisy little ones you are!
sentences.CN: 你们俩个小家伙可真吵啊！

sentences.EN: Granny, please, can we leave the table and go and see Polly Parrot?
sentences.CN: 奶奶，我们现在可以离开餐桌去和鹦鹉波利玩吗？

sentences.EN: Are you sure you've completely finished your cake?
sentences.CN: 你们确定已经吃干净蛋糕了吗？
乔治，你和波利说些话吧。

sentences.EN: George is a little bit shy.
Peppa and George are really enjoying playing with Polly Parrot.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治真的很喜欢和波利一起玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are pretending to be parrots.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在假装自己是鹦鹉。

sentences.EN: Peppa is thinking of something else to say to Polly Parrot.
sentences.CN: 佩奇在想有什么可以对鹦鹉波利说的。

sentences.EN: have you been playing with Polly?
sentences.CN: 你们是不是正在和波利玩？

sentences.EN: Polly is such a sweet parrot.
sentences.CN: 波利是一只多么可爱的鹦鹉。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are playing hide and seek.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在玩捉迷藏。

sentences.EN: It is George's turn to hide.
He must quickly find somewhere to hide before Peppa finishes counting!
sentences.CN: 他必须要在佩奇数完数前赶快找地方藏起来。

sentences.EN: George has found somewhere to hide just in time!
sentences.CN: 乔治正好及时找到地方藏起来了

sentences.EN: Peppa has to find where George is hiding.
sentences.CN: 佩奇要找到乔治藏在哪。

sentences.EN: George, I could see you too easily.
sentences.CN: 乔治，我很容易就看到你了。

sentences.EN: Now it is Peppa's turn to hide.

sentences.CN: 好了，乔治，挣开你的眼睛吧！

sentences.EN: George has to find where Peppa is hiding.
sentences.CN: 乔治要找到佩奇藏在哪。

sentences.EN: Peppa isn't hiding under the table.
George, have you thought of looking upstairs?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你有没有想过上楼上看看？
佩奇也没有藏在床底下。
佩奇也没有藏在窗帘后。

sentences.EN: There is that strange noise again!
George has found where Peppa was hiding.
sentences.CN: 乔治找到佩奇藏在哪了。

sentences.EN: Now it's Daddy's turn to hide!
Oh, I think George should have another turn.
sentences.CN: 哦，我想乔治应该再藏一次。

sentences.EN: But George isn't very good at hiding...
I'm sure he'll be better this time.
sentences.CN: 我相信他这次会藏得很好的。

sentences.EN: Close your eyes and start counting.
sentences.CN: 闭上你的眼睛开始数吧。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Peppa will easily find George.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。佩奇会很容易找到乔治的。

sentences.EN: Ready or not, here I come!
Oh, George isn't hiding under the table!
sentences.CN: 哦，乔治没有藏在桌底下！

sentences.EN: But George always hides under the table!
sentences.CN: 但是乔治以前总藏在桌底下的！

sentences.EN: Have you thought of looking upstairs?
sentences.CN: 你有没有想过看看楼上呢？

sentences.EN: George is in the toy basket.
sentences.CN: 乔治肯定藏在玩具篮里。

sentences.EN: George is not in the toy basket!
sentences.CN: 乔治没有藏到玩具篮里！

sentences.EN: Peppa can not find George anywhere.
Daddy? I can't find George anywhere.
Oh, dear, I wonder where he can be.
sentences.CN: 哦，这样啊，我很想知道他会藏到哪。

sentences.EN: Actually, I think there's something about George in this newspaper...
sentences.CN: 事实上，我想报纸上有些关于乔治的消息。。。

sentences.EN: That was a good place to hide!
sentences.CN: 那真是一个捉迷藏的好地方！

sentences.EN: George was hiding behind Daddy Pig's newspaper all the time!
sentences.CN: 原来乔治一真藏在猪爸爸的报纸后面！

titleCN: 乔治第一天上幼儿园（幼儿园）

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are going to the playgroup.
sentences.CN: 乔治和佩奇一起去幼儿园。
这是乔治第一天去幼儿园。

sentences.EN: George, are you looking forward to the playgroup?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你是不是很期待去幼儿园呢？

sentences.EN: Daddy, maybe George is too small to go to my playgroup?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，乔治会不会年纪太小不适合上幼儿园啊？

sentences.EN: There'll be you and Mr.Dinosaur there to keep him company.
sentences.CN: 有你和恐龙先生陪在他身边。

sentences.EN: But I want to play with the big children!
sentences.CN: 但我想和大一点的小朋友玩！

sentences.EN: Not George and his toy dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 不想和乔治和他的恐龙玩具玩。

sentences.EN: Oh dear, Peppa doesn't want George to go to her playgroup.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊，佩奇不想和乔治一起去幼儿园。

sentences.EN: Daddy, are you sure George is big enough?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，你确定乔治能上幼儿园吗?

sentences.EN: Madame Gazelle looks after the children at the playgroup.
sentences.CN: 羚羊夫人在照看幼儿园里的小朋友。

sentences.EN: Hello! This is my little brother, George.
sentences.CN: 你们好！这是我的弟弟，乔治。

sentences.EN: I wish I had a little brother like George.
sentences.CN: 我希望我也有一个像乔治一样的弟弟。

sentences.EN: Peppa is proud of her little brother, George.
sentences.CN: 佩奇为她的弟弟感到自豪。

sentences.EN: Shall we show George how we paint pictures?
sentences.CN: 我们让乔治看看我们是怎么画画的？

sentences.EN: George is not very good at painting.
Well, maybe you could help him?
sentences.CN: 那么，也许你能帮帮他吧？

sentences.EN: I will show him how to paint a flower.
sentences.CN: 我会教他怎么去画一朵小花。

sentences.EN: George, today I'm going to teach you how to paint a flower.
sentences.CN: 乔治，今天我来教你怎么画一朵花。

sentences.EN: First, you paint a big circle.
sentences.CN: 首先，你画一个大大的圆圈。

sentences.EN: No, George, that's the wrong color.
Now you paint the flower's petals.
Now you paint the stalk and the leaves.
George, you've done it all wrong!
Now what do we have here?
sentences.CN: 你们画得怎么样了？（现在我们这里有什么画呢？）

sentences.EN: And George has painted a dinosaur.
I think George and Peppa's pictures should go on the wall.
sentences.CN: 我认为乔治和佩奇的画都应该挂在墙上。

sentences.EN: Peppa, You must be very proud of your little brother.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，你的弟弟一定让你感到很自豪。

sentences.EN: It is home time and the children's parents are here to pick them up.
sentences.CN: 放学了家长们来接小朋友回家了。

sentences.EN: Yes, and he can paint us another lovely picture.
sentences.CN: 是的，他还能给我们画其它可爱的画。

sentences.EN: And what will you paint next time, George?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你下次会画什么呢？

sentences.EN: Well, maybe you can show us all how to paint a dinosaur?
sentences.CN: 好的，也许你可以教教大家如何去画恐龙。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is working on her computer.
Daddy Pig is making soup for lunch.
Daddy? Can we go and watch Mummy on her computer?
sentences.CN: 爸爸？我们可以去看妈妈在电脑前工作吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, as long as you don't disturb her.
sentences.CN: 是的，只要你们不打扰她工作。

sentences.EN: She has a lot of important work to do today.
sentences.CN: 她今天有很多重要的工作要做。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig has a lot of important work to do.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈有很多重要的工作要做。

sentences.EN: Mummy. Can George and I sit on your lap and watch you work?
sentences.CN: 妈妈。乔治和可以坐在你大腿上看你工作吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, if you both sit quietly.
sentences.CN: 可以，如果你俩保持安静。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love to watch Mummy work on the computer.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢看妈妈在电脑前工作。

sentences.EN: Mummy? Can we play that computer game ''Happy Mrs. Chicken''?
sentences.CN: 妈妈？我们可以玩电脑游戏“快乐小鸡”吗？

sentences.EN: We can play ''Happy Mrs. Chicken'' later.
sentences.CN: 我们一会儿可以玩“快乐小鸡”。

sentences.EN: But now I have to work.
Mummy? Can we help you work?
sentences.CN: 妈妈？我们可以帮你工作吗？

sentences.EN: No, Peppa! You mustn't touch the computer.
sentences.CN: 不行，佩奇！你不能乱碰电脑。

sentences.EN: And George, you mustn't touch the computer, either.
sentences.CN: 乔治，你也不能乱碰电脑。

sentences.EN: Yes, George. You mustn't do this.
sentences.CN: 是的，乔治。你不可以这样乱碰。

sentences.EN: I was just showing George what not to do.
sentences.CN: 我只是想让乔治看看什么是不能做的。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. The computer is not meant to do that.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。电脑好像出现了故障。
发生了什么事了，猪妈妈？

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig, can you mend the computer?
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，你能修好这台电脑吗？

sentences.EN: I'll finish the lunch while you mend the computer.
sentences.CN: 我去做午餐，你来修这台电脑吧。

sentences.EN: Err... Right you are, Mummy Pig,
but I'm not very good with these things...
sentences.CN: 但是我不是很善长于修电脑。。。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is going to mend the computer!
Um. Maybe if I just switch it off...And then switch it on again...
sentences.CN: 嗯。也许如果我先把电脑关了。。。然后再重新开机。。。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has mended the computer!
Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things.
sentences.CN: 是的，我是这方面的专家。

sentences.EN: Daddy? Can we play that computer game, ''Happy Mrs. Chicken?''
sentences.CN: 爸爸？我们可以玩电脑游戏“快乐小鸡”吗？

sentences.EN: Maybe you should ask Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 也许你们应该问一下妈妈。

sentences.EN: Mummy said that we could play it later.
sentences.CN: 妈妈说我们呆会可以玩。

sentences.EN: But I don't know where the disc is.
sentences.CN: 但是我不知道游戏光盘在哪。

sentences.EN: What on earth is going on?
Well, I see that the computer is working again.
sentences.CN: 好的，我看到电脑又能重新工作了。

sentences.EN: George is playing with his ball in the garden.
George, you're doing it all wrong!
This is how to catch a ball.
What a cheeky little one, pig Peppa is.
sentences.CN: 佩奇真是一头顽皮的小猪。

sentences.EN: Maybe Peppa is teasing George just a bit too much.
sentences.CN: 也许佩奇逗乔治逗得有点过份了！

sentences.EN: Peppa, have you been teasing George?
sentences.CN: 佩奇，你是不是在逗乔治玩啊？

sentences.EN: Not really, Mummy, I was teaching him how to catch.
sentences.CN: 不是的，妈妈，我在教乔治接球。

sentences.EN: Really? Oh, well, I know a game that will teach George how to catch.
sentences.CN: 真的吗？哦，好的，我知道一个游戏能教会乔治如何接球。

sentences.EN: Peppa, you take the ball and stand over there.
and George, you stand over there.
Good! You have to throw the ball to each other.
and I have to try and catch it.
I'm the piggy in the middle.
Mummy is the piggy in the middle.
sentences.CN: 妈妈是中间的一头小猪。

sentences.EN: Now you throw the ball to Peppa.
George can't throw the ball past Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 乔治不能把球扔给佩奇（越过妈妈）。

sentences.EN: Silly George. I can do that, too.
sentences.CN: 傻呼呼的乔治。我也能那样做。

sentences.EN: but she's too big and has got stuck.
now it's your turn to be piggy.
sentences.CN: 现在轮到你来做中间的小猪。

sentences.EN: Caught it! George, you're the piggy!
sentences.CN: 接住！乔治，你是中间的小猪！

sentences.EN: Oh, dear! Peppa, you shouldn't tease George like that.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊！佩奇，你不应该这样戏弄乔治。

sentences.EN: Daddy, George is too little to play ''Piggy in the middle''.
sentences.CN: 爸爸，乔治太小了不能做“中间的小猪”。

sentences.EN: Oh, I'm sure he's big enough.
Yes, it is. I just gave George a helping hand.
sentences.CN: 是公平的。我只是帮了乔治一下。

sentences.EN: Mummy, can I have a helping hand?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，你可以帮我一下吗？

sentences.EN: He needs to wear glasses to see clearly.
sentences.CN: 他需要戴着眼镜才能看得清楚。

sentences.EN: When Daddy Pig wears his glasses,everything looks fine.
sentences.CN: 当猪爸爸戴着眼镜时，一切都看得很清楚。

sentences.EN: But when Daddy Pig takes his glasses off......he can't see things clearly.
sentences.CN: 但是当猪爸爸摘下眼镜时。。。。。。他就看不清了。

sentences.EN: Everything looks a bit soft and fuzzy.
sentences.CN: 所有的东西看上去都很模糊。

sentences.EN: So, it is very important that Daddy Pig knows where his glasses are.
sentences.CN: 所以，对于猪爸爸来说，知道他的眼镜在哪是很重要的。

sentences.EN: Sometimes, Daddy Pig loses his glasses.
sentences.CN: 有时，猪爸爸会找不到他的眼镜。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George. Have you seen Daddy Pig's glasses?
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治。你们看到爸爸的眼镜了吗？

sentences.EN: Peppa and George do not know where Daddy Pig's glasses are.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治不知道猪爸爸的眼镜在哪。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig cannot see a thing without them.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸没有眼镜什么都看不到

sentences.EN: and it makes him very grumpy.
Without his glasses on, Daddy Pig cannot read his newspaper.
sentences.CN: 没有眼镜，猪爸爸不能看报纸。

sentences.EN: This is ridiculous!I can't see anything!
sentences.CN: 真可笑！我什么也看不到！

sentences.EN: Somebody must have put my glasses somewhere.
sentences.CN: 一定是有人将我的眼镜藏起来了。

sentences.EN: Do you remember where you last put them,Daddy Pig?
sentences.CN: 你还记得你最后把他们放哪了吗，猪爸爸？

sentences.EN: When I don't wear them,I always put them in my pocket.
sentences.CN: 当我不戴时，我总是把眼镜放在我的口袋里。
但是它现在不在口袋里。

sentences.EN: Daddy! Can we help find your glasses?
sentences.CN: 爸爸！我们能帮你一起找眼镜吗？

sentences.EN: Daddy will stop being so grumpy.
Peppa and George are looking for Daddy's glasses.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治开始找爸爸的眼镜了。

sentences.EN: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.
sentences.CN: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜不在那里。

sentences.EN: George looks on top of the television.
sentences.CN: 乔治找了电视机的上面。

sentences.EN: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.
sentences.CN: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜也不在那里。。

sentences.EN: Let's look upstairs in Mummy and Daddy's bedroom!
sentences.CN: 让我们上楼去妈妈和爸爸的卧室找找！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are looking in Mummy and Daddy Pig's bedroom.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治开始在猪妈妈和猪爸爸的卧室里找。

sentences.EN: George... be careful not to knock anything over.
sentences.CN: 乔治。。。小心点，不要碰倒东西了。

sentences.EN: But Daddy Pig's glasses are not there.
sentences.CN: 但是猪爸爸的眼镜不在那。

sentences.EN: But the glasses are not there, either.
Peppa and George are looking in the bathroom.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治开始在浴室找。

sentences.EN: The glasses are not in the bath.
The glasses are not in the toilet.
Peppa and George cannot find Daddy Pig's glasses anywhere.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治到处找都没找到猪爸爸的眼镜。

sentences.EN: But we can't find Daddy's glasses.
sentences.CN: 但是我们没有找到爸爸的眼镜。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Now, what can we do?
sentences.CN: 哦，糟了。现在，我们该怎么办？

sentences.EN: I suppose I'll just have to learn to do without them...
sentences.CN: 我想我只有适应没有眼镜的生活。。。

sentences.EN: If I move slowly, I won't bump into things.
sentences.CN: 如果走得慢，我不会撞到东西的。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig. You were sitting on them all the time!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸。原来你一直坐在眼镜上面！

sentences.EN: I don't know how they got there.
sentences.CN: 我不知道它怎么会跑到那里去的。

sentences.EN: Well, you may have been a bit silly,
Daddy Pig, but at least you're not grumpy anymore!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，但至少你不会焦躁了！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are playing at Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig's house.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在猪爷爷和猪奶奶家里玩。

sentences.EN: I just make a little hole and put the seed in.
sentences.CN: 我先挖个小坑然后把种子放进去。

sentences.EN: Then I cover it with earth and water it.
Everything in my garden grows from tiny seeds like these.
sentences.CN: 我花园里所有东西都是从这样小的种子长成的。
连那个大苹果树也是吗？

sentences.EN: This tiny seed will grow into a little apple tree, like this.
sentences.CN: 这小小的种子会长成一棵小苹果树，就像这棵。

sentences.EN: And that little apple tree will grow into a big apple tree like this.
sentences.CN: 然后这些小苹果树会长成像这样大的苹果树。

sentences.EN: And inside this apple are more seeds.
sentences.CN: 而且这苹果里还有很多这样的种子。
可以长出更多的苹果树！

sentences.EN: Grandpa! Grandpa! I want to plant a seed!
sentences.CN: 爷爷！爷爷！我想种一粒种子！

sentences.EN: Would you like to plant a strawberry seed?
sentences.CN: 你想不想种粒草莓种子？

sentences.EN: This seed will grow into a lovely strawberry plant.
sentences.CN: 这个种子会长成一棵可爱的草莓。

sentences.EN: Then I put the seed in and cover it with earth.
sentences.CN: 然后我把种子放在里面再埋上土。

sentences.EN: Shall I water it for you?
No! No! I want to water it.
sentences.CN: 不要！不要！我想自己来浇水。

sentences.EN: Good! Now we wait for it to grow.
sentences.CN: 好的！现在我们来等它长大。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are waiting for the seed to grow.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治等着种子发芽。

sentences.EN: You will have to be patient, Peppa.
It will take a long time to grow.
sentences.CN: 它需要很长的时间才能发芽。

sentences.EN: Peppa! George! It's time to go home.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，是时候回家了！

sentences.EN: But we're waiting for my strawberry plant to grow!
sentences.CN: 但是我在等着我的草莓发芽！
我还等着草莓来泡茶呢。

sentences.EN: the seed will have grown into a plant.
sentences.CN: 这些种子就会长成草莓苗。
再见，爷爷。 再见，草莓。

sentences.EN: Grandpa Pig looks after Peppa's strawberry plant.
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷照看着佩奇的草莓苗。

sentences.EN: After many days, Grandpa Pig finds a tiny plant growing.
sentences.CN: 过了几天，猪爷爷发现一棵小幼苗长出来了。

sentences.EN: Day by day, the plant grows bigger and bigger.
sentences.CN: 日复一日，草莓苗越长越大。

sentences.EN: Then one day, Grandpa Pig finds something very special.
sentences.CN: 然后有一天，猪爷爷发现了一些特别的东西。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George have come to play again.
Grandpa! Grandpa! Did my plant grow?
sentences.CN: 爷爷！爷爷！我的草莓苗长大了吗？

sentences.EN: Grandpa, can we plant something else?
sentences.CN: 爷爷，我们能不能种点别的呢？

sentences.EN: Yes! Now, it's George's turn to choose.
sentences.CN: 可以！现在，轮到乔治选了。

sentences.EN: Grandpa, I think George wants to grow a carrot.
sentences.CN: 爷爷，我想乔治想种胡萝卜。

sentences.EN: George, would you like to grow a carrot?
What would you like to grow?
George has thought of something he wants to grow.
sentences.CN: 乔治想到他想种的东西了。

sentences.EN: George wants to grow a dinosaur tree!

sentences.CN: 恐龙是不会长成恐龙树的。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George, Mummy and Daddy are having breakfast.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，妈妈和爸爸正在吃早餐。

sentences.EN: It is a lovely, sunny day,
sentences.CN: 今天天气明媚，阳光灿烂，

sentences.EN: and Peppa and George can't wait to go into the garden to play.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治逼不及待要去花园玩。

sentences.EN: Mummy, please, can we go out to play?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我们可以出去玩了吗？

sentences.EN: You can go out to play when you finish your breakfast.
sentences.CN: 等你们吃完早餐就可以出去玩了。

sentences.EN: George! Don't drink your juice too quickly!
sentences.CN: 乔治！果汁不要喝得那么快。

sentences.EN: George drank his juice too quickly,
sentences.CN: 乔治喝果汁喝得太快了，

sentences.EN: Can we go out to play now, Mummy?
sentences.CN: 我们现在可以出去玩吗，妈妈？
现在不行因为乔治在打嗝。

sentences.EN: But George's hiccups have gone, Mummy.
sentences.CN: 但是乔治已经不打嗝了，妈妈。

sentences.EN: Oh, alright, you can go out and play.
sentences.CN: 哦，好吧，你们可以出去玩了。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love playing in the garden.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在花园里玩。

sentences.EN: George. I'm going to throw the ball,and then you have to catch it.
sentences.CN: 乔治，我准备扔球了，然后你要接住哦。

sentences.EN: George! Now you throw the ball to me,and I have to catch it.
sentences.CN: 乔治！ 现在你把球扔给我，然后我接住球。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, George's hiccups are spoiling the game.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕，乔治的打嗝让他们没办法玩游戏。

sentences.EN: George... I know how to cure hiccups!
sentences.CN: 乔治。。。我知道怎样治好打嗝！

sentences.EN: You have to do what I say.
Rub the top of your head and rub your tummy!
sentences.CN: 你在挠你头顶的同时按摸你的肚子！

sentences.EN: Good! Now your hiccups have gone!
Peppa's cure for hiccups doesn't seem to have worked.
sentences.CN: 佩奇治打嗝的办法似乎没凑效。

sentences.EN: George! You have done it all wrong!
I know a better way to cure hiccups!
sentences.CN: 我知道一个更好的办法治好打嗝！

sentences.EN: First, jump up and down three times on one leg!
Now, wave your arms up and down.
sentences.CN: 现在，上下挥动你的手臂。

sentences.EN: and turn around quickly, three times!
Peppa's new cure hasn't worked, either.
sentences.CN: 佩奇的新治法也没有凑效。

sentences.EN: To cure hiccups, the ill piggy must be given a shock!
sentences.CN: 要治好打嗝，必须要给打嗝的小猪惊吓才行！

sentences.EN: George, I'm going to scare you.
it's only a game and it will stop your hiccups.
sentences.CN: 它只是个游戏，它可以治好你的打嗝。

sentences.EN: Remember, this is just pretend scaring.
Peppa! You mustn't play so roughly with George!
sentences.CN: 佩奇！你不应该和乔治玩得那么粗暴！

sentences.EN: I was just trying to stop George's hiccups.
sentences.CN: 我只是尝试着帮乔治治好打嗝。

sentences.EN: Here comes Daddy Pig, with two beakers of juice.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸走来了，拿着二杯果汁。

sentences.EN: George! If you drink too quickly, you will get hiccups again!
sentences.CN: 乔治！如果你喝太快，你又会打嗝的！

sentences.EN: I'm not as little as George.
I can drink juice as quickly as I want to!
sentences.CN: 我可以想喝多快就多快！

sentences.EN: It is a lovely, sunny day,
sentences.CN: 今天是个阳光灿烂的日子，

sentences.EN: and Peppa and George are riding their bicycles.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在骑自行车。

sentences.EN: That's a fine pumpkin, Daddy Pig!
sentences.CN: 这真是一个很不错的南瓜，猪爸爸！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is very proud of his pumpkin.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸对他的南瓜感到很自豪。

sentences.EN: Pumpkins are the only thing I can grow.
sentences.CN: 南瓜是我唯一能种的东西。

sentences.EN: Probably because I love pumpkin pie!
sentences.CN: 这可能是因为我喜欢吃南瓜派吧！

sentences.EN: Danny Dog, Suzy Sheep and Rebecca Rabbit are riding their bicycles.
sentences.CN: 小狗丹尼，小羊苏茜和小兔瑞贝卡在骑自行车。

sentences.EN: Let's race to Daddy Pig's pumpkin.
sentences.CN: 让我们来比赛，看谁先到达猪爸爸的南瓜那里。

sentences.EN: If we race to Daddy's Pumpkin,
sentences.CN: 如果我们要骑到爸爸的南瓜那里，

sentences.EN: We have to be very careful not to bump into it.
sentences.CN: 我们得非常小心，千万别撞上去。

sentences.EN: Daddy would be very sad if the pumpkin got broken.
sentences.CN: 如果南瓜撞坏了，爸爸会非常伤心的。

sentences.EN: Peppa and her friends are racing to Daddy Pig's pumpkin!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和她的朋友比赛谁先到达南瓜！

sentences.EN: Hey! Watch out for my pumpkin!!

sentences.CN: 佩奇！小心点！ 爸爸的南瓜啊！！！！

sentences.EN: Look at George! He's going so slowly!
George is still riding a baby bike!
sentences.CN: 乔治现在还骑着儿童自行车呢！

sentences.EN: Yours is a baby bike, too, Peppa!
sentences.CN: 你的也是儿童自行车，佩奇！
你的车子两旁还有辅助轮！

sentences.EN: I can ride without my stabilizers.
sentences.CN: 我骑的自行车可没有辅助轮的。

sentences.EN: Let's ride up the hill again!
No, I think I'll stay here.
sentences.CN: 不了，我想我要呆在这里。

sentences.EN: Peppa wishes she did not have stabilizers on her bicycle.
sentences.CN: 佩奇希望她的自行车上没有辅助轮。

sentences.EN: Daddy, I don't want stabilizers anymore.
sentences.CN: 爸爸，我不想再有辅助轮了。

sentences.EN: Do you think you can ride without them?
Alright, Peppa. Let's take them off.
sentences.CN: 那好吧，佩奇。我们把辅助轮卸掉。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is taking the stabilizers off Peppa's bicycle.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸把辅助轮从佩奇的自行车上卸掉。

sentences.EN: Are you sure you want to ride without stabilizers?
sentences.CN: 你确信没有辅助轮你能骑吗？

sentences.EN: I can do it. I can! I can!
sentences.CN: 我可以做到的。我可以！我可以！

sentences.EN: Riding Without stabilizers is not easy.
sentences.CN: 没有辅助轮的自行车一点也不容易骑。

sentences.EN: Would you like some help, Peppa?

sentences.CN: 不用担心，我会抓紧你的。

sentences.EN: Peppa is riding on her own without stabilizers!
sentences.CN: 佩奇能自己骑自行车，不需要辅助轮了！

sentences.EN: You've been cycling on your own for ages.
sentences.CN: 你已经一个人骑了很久了。

sentences.EN: You're really very good at it!
Oh, I can do it! Look at me!
Look at me! I can ride my bike properly.
sentences.CN: 看看我！我能自己骑两轮自行车了。

sentences.EN: I don't need my stabilizers anymore!

sentences.CN: 比赛骑到爸爸的南瓜那里！

sentences.EN: Peppa isn't looking where she is going!
Oh, dear, Peppa has squashed Daddy Pig's pumpkin!
sentences.CN: 哦,糟糕了，佩奇把猪爸爸的南瓜撞碎了！

sentences.EN: Sorry I squashed your pumpkin, Daddy.
sentences.CN: 对不起，爸爸，我把南瓜撞碎了。

sentences.EN: The important thing is that you are okay.
sentences.CN: 重要的是你没有受伤就好了。

sentences.EN: In future, you really must look where you are going.

sentences.CN: 我保证我以后会的，爸爸。

sentences.EN: Good. Anyway, now the pumpkin is broken,
sentences.CN: 好吧。既然现在南瓜都已经碎了，

sentences.EN: I can make it into pumpkin pie!
sentences.CN: 我们就用它来做南瓜派吧！

sentences.EN: And because Daddy Pig's pumpkin is so big,
sentences.CN: 因为猪爸爸的南瓜很大，

sentences.EN: there will be enough pumpkin pie for everyone!
sentences.CN: 所以我们每个人都可以吃到南瓜派了！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig has made a special box for Peppa.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈给佩奇做了一个特别的盒子。

sentences.EN: Peppa, this box is just for you!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，这个盒子是给你的！

sentences.EN: It's a secret box for you to keep secret things in.
sentences.CN: 这是给你放秘密东西的秘密盒子。

sentences.EN: What things can I put in it, Mummy?
sentences.CN: 我可以放什么进去啊，妈妈？

sentences.EN: Only you can decide that, Peppa!
sentences.CN: 只有你自己能决定了，佩奇！

sentences.EN: I know what I can put in it!
sentences.CN: 我知道我可以放什么进去了！

sentences.EN: I won't tell you or George or Daddy!
sentences.CN: 我不会告诉你，乔治还有爸爸的！

sentences.EN: George, this is my secret box!
sentences.CN: 乔治，这是我的秘密盒子！

sentences.EN: It's empty. I have to find some things to put inside.
sentences.CN: 它是空的。我得找些东西放里面。

sentences.EN: No, George, only I must know what's in the box.
sentences.CN: 不，乔治，只有我可以知道里面放了什么。

sentences.EN: You have to wait outside while I choose.
sentences.CN: 我选东西时你得在外面等。

sentences.EN: Peppa is going to choose some secret things to put in the box.
sentences.CN: 佩奇选东西放进秘密盒子里。

sentences.EN: Now, my secret box is full!
sentences.CN: 现在，我的秘密盒子装满了！

sentences.EN: George, you must not look inside!
sentences.CN: 乔治，你不准偷看里面的东西哦！

sentences.EN: George would like to know what is inside Peppa's secret box.
sentences.CN: 乔治想知道佩奇的秘密盒子里有什么。

sentences.EN: If you like, you can try to guess.
sentences.CN: 如果你想知道，你可以猜猜看。

sentences.EN: George thinks Peppa has put a dinosaur in the box!
sentences.CN: 乔治认为佩奇把恐龙放进盒子里！
你总是把所有东西都说成“恐龙”！

sentences.EN: Anyway, a dinosaur is too big to fit in the box.
sentences.CN: 至少，恐龙太大了放不进盒子里的啊。

sentences.EN: George cannot guess what is in Peppa's secret box.
sentences.CN: 乔治猜不到佩奇秘密盒子里装的是什么东西。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is cleaning a picture.
Daddy! This is my secret box!
sentences.CN: 爸爸！这是我的秘密盒子！

sentences.EN: George tried to guess,but he didn't get it right.
Hmmm. Have you put my glasses inside?
sentences.CN: 嗯。你把我的眼镜放里面了？

sentences.EN: No!!! Your glasses are on your head!
sentences.CN: 不对！！！你的眼镜在你头上。

sentences.EN: Silly Daddy! You must have a proper guess.
sentences.CN: 糊涂的爸爸！你得再猜猜。

sentences.EN: Ok. Have you put Mummy's shoes in the box?
sentences.CN: 好的。你把妈妈的鞋子放盒子里了？

sentences.EN: Nope! And that's all your guesses. Used up!
sentences.CN: 不对！你所有可以猜的机会，都用完了！

sentences.EN: Mummy! No one knows what is in my box!
sentences.CN: 妈妈！没人知道我盒子里装了什么！

sentences.EN: I made a box for George, too!
sentences.CN: 我也给乔治做了一个盒子！

sentences.EN: And he's filled it with secret things!
sentences.CN: 他已经装满了秘密的东西！

sentences.EN: And only George knows what's inside.
sentences.CN: 只有乔治知道里面装了什么东西。

sentences.EN: Peppa would like to know what is inside George's box.
sentences.CN: 佩奇想知道乔治的盒子里有什么东西。

sentences.EN: It's George's toy dinosaur, of course!
sentences.CN: 当然是乔治的恐龙玩具啦！

sentences.EN: George's toy dinosaur is not in George's box.
sentences.CN: 乔治的恐龙玩具不在乔治的盒子里。

sentences.EN: It's too difficult! I'll never guess!
sentences.CN: 这也太难了。我永远也猜不到！

sentences.EN: Peppa does not like secrets as much as she used to.
sentences.CN: 佩奇不像之前那么喜欢秘密了。

sentences.EN: Maybe, if you showed George one thing from your box,
sentences.CN: 也许，如果你给乔治看一样你盒子里的东西，

sentences.EN: then he could show you one thing from his.
sentences.CN: 那么乔治也可以给你看一样他的东西。

sentences.EN: Ok. But we must do it at the same time.
On the count of three, you each show what's in your boxes.
sentences.CN: 数到三，你们同时打开盒子。

sentences.EN: George has a drum and Peppa has a trumpet.
sentences.CN: 乔治藏了个鼓，佩奇藏了个喇叭。

sentences.EN: Do you have anymore secret things?
sentences.CN: 你们还有什么秘密东西吗？
乔治藏了一个蛋奶甜甜圈！
但是佩奇的盒子是空的。

sentences.EN: Luckily, I have! Come on. Tuck in.
sentences.CN: 幸好，我还有！来吧。快吃吧。

sentences.EN: George, Peppa, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig all like custard doughnuts!
sentences.CN: 乔治，佩奇，猪妈妈和猪爸爸都喜欢蛋奶甜甜圈！

sentences.EN: I don't have a special box.
But I know a very good place to hide my custard doughnut!
sentences.CN: 但我有个好地方可以藏我的蛋奶甜甜圈！

sentences.EN: Um. Are you going to hide it in the fridge?
sentences.CN: 嗯。你打算把它藏在冰箱里吗？

sentences.EN: I'm going to hide mine in my tummy!
sentences.CN: 我也要把我的藏在我的肚子里！

sentences.EN: It is a bright, sunny day.
sentences.CN: 今天是一个阳光明媚的日子。

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family are in the park.
They are going to fly a kite!
George is going to fly the kite first.
sentences.CN: 乔治要第一个把风筝放起来。

sentences.EN: George runs as fast as he can.

sentences.CN: 但是风筝就是不能飞起来。

sentences.EN: George! You're doing it all wrong!
Peppa runs as fast as she can.
But the kite still won't fly.
sentences.CN: 但是风筝仍然没有飞起来。

sentences.EN: The kite won't fly if there isn't any wind,
sentences.CN: 如果没有风，风筝是飞不起来的，

sentences.EN: no matter how fast you run.
We'll just have to wait, until the wind picks up a bit.
sentences.CN: 我们再等等吧，有点风起来就可以了。

sentences.EN: Now that it is windy, the kite can fly!
sentences.CN: 现在起风了，风筝可以飞起来了！

sentences.EN: The wind is quite strong now.
Daddy pig flies the kite very well.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸的风筝放得很不错。

sentences.EN: Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things
sentences.CN: 没错，在这种事情上我算是专家了。

sentences.EN: You might get the kite stuck in one.
sentences.CN: 你会把风筝卡在树上的。

sentences.EN: Don't worry，I know what I'm doing.
sentences.CN: 不用担心，我知道我在做什么。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig has got the kite caught in a tree.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸把风筝卡在了一棵树上。

sentences.EN: Don't worry, George.Daddy will get the kite down.
sentences.CN: 不用担心，乔治。爸爸会把风筝拿下来的。

sentences.EN: Careful! There's a big muddy puddle!
sentences.CN: 小心点！那里有一个大泥坑！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love to jump in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢跳进泥坑玩。

sentences.EN: Can we jump in the puddle?
sentences.CN: 我们可以跳进泥坑里吗？

sentences.EN: No. I don't want you covered in mud.
sentences.CN: 不行。我不想你们浑身都是泥。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig, you are much too heavy for that branch!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，你太重了树枝撑不住了！

sentences.EN: Nonsense! I know exactly how heavy I am.
sentences.CN: 胡说！我知道我自己有多重！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has rescued the kite!
Oh, dear. Everyone is covered in mud.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。每个人身上都是泥了。

sentences.EN: Luckily, Daddy Pig hasn't hurt himseIf.
And the kite is out of the tree!
sentences.CN: 而风筝也从树上拿下来了！

sentences.EN: Mummy... Now that we are all muddy,
sentences.CN: 妈妈。。。现在我们都全身是泥了，

sentences.EN: can we jump in the puddle?
sentences.CN: 我们可以跳进泥坑里玩了吧？

sentences.EN: After all, you can't get any muddier...
And I think Daddy Pig is going to be doing the washing...
sentences.CN: 但我想猪爸爸得去洗洗才行。。。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: Mummy and Daddy love jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 妈妈和爸爸也喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: Jumping up and down in muddy puddles is just as much fun as flying the kite!
sentences.CN: 在泥坑里跳来跳去就和放风筝一样有趣！

sentences.EN: It is a lovely bright, sunny day.
sentences.CN: 今天是个阳光明媚的好日子。

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family are going for a picnic!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和她的家人外出野餐！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is bringing the picnic basket.
Picnic-blanket, bread, cheese, tomatoes and lemonade.
sentences.CN: 野餐布，面包，奶酪，蕃茄和柠檬汽水。
有没有什么东西我们忘记了？

sentences.EN: Mummy's home-made strawberry cake is there, too.
sentences.CN: 妈妈亲手做的草莓蛋糕也在这里。

sentences.EN: This looks like just the spot for our picnic!
sentences.CN: 这个地方看起来很适合我们野餐！

sentences.EN: We should run around a bit and get some exercise!
sentences.CN: 我们应该稍微跑一下做点运动！

sentences.EN: I want to eat, then have a nap.
sentences.CN: 我想吃点东西，再睡一会。

sentences.EN: I certainly don't want to run around.
Maybe Daddy should run around a bit.
But later, I will get some exercise,even if no one else does.
sentences.CN: 但是过一会儿我会做些运动，即使没有其他人做。

sentences.EN: Good idea, Mummy Pig! I'm really hungry!
sentences.CN: 好主意，猪妈妈！我真的饿了！

sentences.EN: I thought you wanted to run around a bit, Daddy Pig?
sentences.CN: 我记得你想到处跑跑的，猪爸爸？

sentences.EN: Look! There's a little duck pond!
sentences.CN: 瞧！那里的池塘有群小鸭子！

sentences.EN: Mummy, can we feed the ducks?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我们可以喂那些鸭子吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, you can feed them the rest of the bread.
sentences.CN: 当然，你们可以用剩余的面包喂他们。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love feeding bread to ducks.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢喂面包给鸭子。

sentences.EN: Mummy, I think they want some more.
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我想他们想要更多一些。

sentences.EN: That was the last of the bread.

sentences.CN: 我相信他们已经吃饱了。

sentences.EN: Sorry, Mrs. Duck, we've no more bread.
sentences.CN: 对不起，鸭子女士，我们没有更多的面包了。
鸭子们想要更多的食物。

sentences.EN: So much for Daddy Pig and his exercise!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸只是嘴上说说要锻炼！

sentences.EN: Peppa told you，there's no more bread!
sentences.CN: 佩奇已经告诉你们，没有面包了！

sentences.EN: Mummy, we do have strawberry cake!
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我们还有草莓蛋糕嘛！

sentences.EN: Well, if there's any cake left over,you can give it to the ducks.
sentences.CN: 好的，如果有剩余的蛋糕，你可以分些给鸭子们。

sentences.EN: Everyone likes Mummy Pig's home-made strawberry cake!
sentences.CN: 每个人都喜欢猪妈妈亲手做的草莓蛋糕！
它只是一只小小的黄蜂而已！

sentences.EN: There! You see, all you had to do is stay still!
sentences.CN: 飞走了！你看，你只要呆着别动就行了！

sentences.EN: I hope the wasp doesn't sting Daddy.
sentences.CN: 我希望黄蜂没有叮到爸爸。

sentences.EN: No, Daddy is running too fast for the wasp to catch him.
sentences.CN: 不会的，爸爸跑得很快黄蜂追不上他。

sentences.EN: Let's eat our cake before the wasp comes back.
sentences.CN: 趁黄蜂还没回来，我们吃蛋糕吧。

sentences.EN: Oh, no! we forgot to leave any for the ducks!
sentences.CN: 哦，不！我们忘记留些给鸭子们了！

sentences.EN: You said you would run around and get some exercise,
sentences.CN: 你不是说过你要跑跑做些运动的吗？

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig! But I didn't believe you'd do it!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸！但是我没有想到你真的做到了！

sentences.EN: Luckily, I managed to hang on to my slice of strawberry cake!
sentences.CN: 幸好，我紧紧抓住了我的草莓蛋糕！

sentences.EN: We promised the rest of the cake for the ducks!
sentences.CN: 我们答应了剩下的蛋糕要分给鸭子们的！
你们真是很幸运的鸭子。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig have been tidying the house.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸在收拾房子。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and I found this old box in the attic!
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和我在阁楼里发现了这个旧箱子。
谁能猜出里面有什么吗？

sentences.EN: They are a bit old and dusty.
This is the violin I used to play when I was little!
sentences.CN: 这是我小时候拉过的小提琴！

sentences.EN: Mummy? Can you play your violin?
sentences.CN: 妈妈？你能拉小提琴来听听吗？

sentences.EN: I haven't played it for a long time!
sentences.CN: 我已经很久没有拉过它了！
求你了，妈妈！拉来听听嘛！

sentences.EN: I hope I haven't forgotten how...
Mummy? Can I play the violin?
sentences.CN: 妈妈？我能拉一下小提琴吗？

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. I do not think it is meant to sound like that.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊。我想小提琴的声音不是这样的。

sentences.EN: That does not sound quite right, either.
sentences.CN: 小提琴的声音也不是这样的。

sentences.EN: The violin is too hard to play!
Peppa! Maybe you would do better with this tin drum,.
sentences.CN: 佩奇！也许你更适合打鼓。

sentences.EN: This is Daddy Pig's old accordion.
sentences.CN: 这是猪爸爸的旧手风琴。

sentences.EN: I used to play this to Mummy Pig when we first met...
sentences.CN: 我和猪妈妈第一次见面时，我拉的就是手风琴。。。

sentences.EN: Oh... Daddy Pig. I remember this tune.
sentences.CN: 哦。。。猪爸爸。我记得这首曲子。

sentences.EN: George wants to play the accordion, too!
George. The accordion is almost as difficult to play as my drum.
sentences.CN: 乔治。拉手风琴差不多和我的打鼓一样难。

sentences.EN: Maybe George is a bit too little to play the accordion.
sentences.CN: 也许乔治太小还不能玩手风琴。

sentences.EN: Daddy? What other instruments are in the box?
sentences.CN: 爸爸？箱子里还有什么乐器吗？

sentences.EN: You have to blow it very hard!
I think I used to be able to play it...
sentences.CN: 我想我以前好像吹响过它。。。

sentences.EN: That really does not sound right.
Maybe it just needs someone big and strong like me!
sentences.CN: 也许这个只有我这么强壮的人来吹才行！

sentences.EN: That does not sound right, either.
Peppa's right, it is impossible to play.
sentences.CN: 佩奇说得对，不可能吹响它。

sentences.EN: Never mind, Daddy Pig.Just stick to the accordion.
sentences.CN: 没关系的，猪爸爸。只要拉手风琴就好了。

sentences.EN: Well, I do play it quite nicely,
sentences.CN: 好吧，我的手风琴是拉得很不错，

sentences.EN: even if I say so myself.
And I will play my drum!
But what instrument will George play?
sentences.CN: 但是乔治该用什么乐器呢？

sentences.EN: Mummy couldn't play the horn and Daddy couldn't play it.
sentences.CN: 妈妈吹不响那只号角，爸爸也吹不响那只号角。

sentences.EN: And even I couldn't play it!
sentences.CN: 甚至我也吹不响那只号角！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are helping Grandpa Pig in his Garden.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在花园里帮猪爷爷干活。

sentences.EN: Grandpa, why do butterflies like flowers?
sentences.CN: 爷爷，为什么蝴蝶会喜欢花朵呢？

sentences.EN: They get their food from flowers.
sentences.CN: 它们可以从花朵里获取食物。
它们有一个非常长的舌头。

sentences.EN: Oh, yes, the butterfly's tongue is even longer than yours.
sentences.CN: 哦，是的，蝴蝶的舌头比你的长多了。

sentences.EN: She uses it to drink from the flower.
sentences.CN: 她用舌头从花朵中喝食物。

sentences.EN: Peppa, the butterfly thinks you're a flower.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，蝴蝶以为你是一朵花。

sentences.EN: I'm not a flower! I'm Peppa Pig!
sentences.CN: 我不是花朵！我是小猪佩奇！

sentences.EN: I want to be a butterfly.
Peppa is playing at being a butterfly.
sentences.CN: 佩奇假装自己是一只蝴蝶。

sentences.EN: You have to be something else.
sentences.CN: 你只能去假扮别的东西了。

sentences.EN: I know! You can be a wriggly worm!
sentences.CN: 我知道了。你可以做一条蠕动的小虫！

sentences.EN: Oh, dear! George does not want to be a worm.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕了！乔治不想做一只小虫。

sentences.EN: He wants to be a butterfly.
George, when I was a little piggy, I used to like playing at being a worm.
sentences.CN: 乔治，当我还是小猪的时候，我就很喜欢扮成一条小虫。

sentences.EN: It's very easy to be a worm.
First, you have to lie down on the ground.
George and Grandpa Pig are having such fun being wriggly worms.
sentences.CN: 乔治与猪爷爷假扮蠕动的小虫，玩得非常开心。

sentences.EN: I'm a little butterfly, I'm a little butterfly.
sentences.CN: 我是一只小蝴蝶，我是一只小蝴蝶。

sentences.EN: Yes, Peppa, you're a beautiful butterfly.
sentences.CN: 是的，佩奇，你是一只美丽的蝴蝶。

sentences.EN: Grandpa! George! What are you doing?
sentences.CN: 爷爷，乔治，你们在干什么？

sentences.EN: I want to be a wriggly worm, too!
sentences.CN: 我也想假扮成一条蠕动的小虫。

sentences.EN: How do you do? I love you!
What animal do you want to be now?
sentences.CN: 你们现在还想假扮什么动物啊？

sentences.EN: Look, Grandpa! There's a little frog!
Why don't you play at being frogs?
sentences.CN: 你们为什么不假扮成一只青蛙呢？

sentences.EN: Hmmm, frogs are not as pretty as butterflies or as wriggly as worms.
sentences.CN: 嗯，可是青蛙没有蝴蝶那么漂亮也不会像小虫一样扭动。

sentences.EN: But frogs do play a game you like.
sentences.CN: 但是青蛙会玩你喜欢的游戏。

sentences.EN: Hmmm... do frogs play dolls' houses?
sentences.CN: 嗯。。。。。。青蛙会玩玩偶之家吗？
你最喜欢的游戏是什么？

sentences.EN: Yes! Frogs love jumping in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 是的！青蛙也喜欢在泥坑里跳。
是的，乔治，我们来假扮青蛙吧！

sentences.EN: The froggies have found a nice big muddy puddle to play in.
sentences.CN: “青蛙们”找到了一个大泥坑来玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 大家喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Butterflies and worms are very nice!
But I like frogs the best!
Peppa and George are playing in Mummy and Daddy's bedroom.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在妈妈和爸爸的卧室里玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa has found a box of old clothes.
sentences.CN: 佩奇找到了一箱旧衣服。

sentences.EN: George! Let's dress up and pretend to be Mummy and Daddy.
sentences.CN: 乔治！让我们装扮成妈妈和爸爸。

sentences.EN: Now it's my turn.This is Mummy's dress.
sentences.CN: 现在轮到我了。这是妈妈的裙子。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig! Where are your shoes?
Now I need to look beautiful, just like Mummy.
sentences.CN: 现在，我需要看上去像妈妈一样漂亮。

sentences.EN: Peppa has found Mummy's make-up box.
sentences.CN: 佩奇找到了妈妈的化妆盒。
非常好看！现在涂些口红。

sentences.EN: Come along, Daddy Pig.It's time to go to work.
sentences.CN: 来吧，猪爸爸。是时候去工作了。

sentences.EN: Mummy is working on her computer.
I'm not Peppa Pig. I'm Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 我不是佩奇。我是猪妈妈。

sentences.EN: Oh, yes! Of course. Hello, Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 哦，是的！的确这样，你好，猪妈妈。

sentences.EN: Hello, and this is Daddy Pig.
And hello to you, too, Daddy Pig.
Excuse me，I've got a lot of work to do!
sentences.CN: 不好意思，我有很多的工作要做！

sentences.EN: Hello? Yes, do this, do that.
Peppa is enjoying pretending to be Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 佩奇很享受扮演成猪妈妈。

sentences.EN: But George is getting a bit bored.
sentences.CN: 但是乔治开始觉得有点无聊了。

sentences.EN: Sorry, Daddy Pig, I'm nearly finished.
sentences.CN: 对不起，猪爸爸，我快完成了。

sentences.EN: Come on, Daddy Pig, it's time you did some work.
sentences.CN: 来吧，猪爸爸，是时候该你干活了。

sentences.EN: Goodbye, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig.
Daddy Pig is digging in the garden.
I'm not Peppa! I'm Mummy Pig and this is Daddy Pig!
sentences.CN: 我不是佩奇！我是猪妈妈，而这是猪爸爸！

sentences.EN: Daddy pig is here to do some work.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸是来这里干活的。

sentences.EN: That's very kind of you, Daddy Pig.
Now, be careful, it's a very deep hole.
sentences.CN: 现在，要小心哦，它是一个很深的坑。

sentences.EN: I do hope you are not digging in your best clothes, Daddy Pig.
sentences.CN: 我真希望你没把土掺进你最好的衣服里，猪爸爸。

sentences.EN: I want to make big snorts, too.
sentences.CN: 我也想发出这么响的鼻鼾声。

sentences.EN: You must take off those muddy clothes before you eat.
sentences.CN: 在吃之前，你们必须脱掉身上的脏衣服。

sentences.EN: I'm Mummy Pig and this is Daddy Pig.
sentences.CN: 我是猪妈妈，而这是猪爸爸。

sentences.EN: So, where are Peppa and George?
sentences.CN: 那么，佩奇和乔治去哪了？

sentences.EN: Oh, well, that's a shame because I've got their favorite ice cream here.
sentences.CN: 哦，好吧，真可惜了我还准备了他们最喜欢的雪糕。

sentences.EN: But if we can't find them,then...
sentences.CN: 但是如果我们找不到他们，那么。。。

sentences.EN: Yes, Mummy, we were just pretending to be you and Daddy.
sentences.CN: 是的，妈妈，我们刚才假扮成你和爸爸。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George have been playing in the garden.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在花园里玩。

sentences.EN: Well, I'm sure we can find them.
sentences.CN: 好啦，我确信我们能找到的。

sentences.EN: Maybe we should try the garden?
sentences.CN: 也许我们试试到花园里找找？

sentences.EN: Everyone is looking for Peppa's shoes.
sentences.CN: 大家都在找佩奇的鞋子。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is looking in the flowerbed.
Daddy Pig is looking in the wheelbarrow.
Peppa and George look in the flowerpots.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在花盆里找。

sentences.EN: Peppa's shoes are not there, either.
We've looked everywhere, but we can't find Peppa's shoes!
sentences.CN: 我们已经到处找了，但是我们找不到佩奇的鞋子！

sentences.EN: Now I haven't got any shoes to wear.
Poor Peppa. Your shoes were getting a bit old.
sentences.CN: 可怜的佩奇。你的鞋子有点旧了

sentences.EN: We'll buy you a new pair!
Can my new shoes be red, Mummy?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我的新鞋可以是红色的吗？

sentences.EN: George! I'm going to have new red shoes!
sentences.CN: 乔治！我有红色新鞋子穿了！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and Peppa are at Miss Rabbit's shoe shop.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和佩奇来到兔小姐的鞋店里。

sentences.EN: We would like to buy some new shoes for Peppa, please.
sentences.CN: 我们想买双新鞋给佩奇。

sentences.EN: Oh I'm sure we can find you some lovely new shoes, Peppa!
sentences.CN: 哦，佩奇，我确信我们能给你找一双漂亮的新鞋子！

sentences.EN: George and Daddy Pig are playing draughts.
sentences.CN: 乔治和猪爸爸在下跳棋。

sentences.EN: Look at my new shoes!They are red!
sentences.CN: 看看我的新鞋子！是红色的！

sentences.EN: Mummy, do you like my new shoes?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，你喜欢我的新鞋子吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, Peppa, they make you look very smart.
sentences.CN: 是的，佩奇，他们让你看起来很漂亮。

sentences.EN: George, do you like my new shoes?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你喜欢我的新鞋子吗？
大家都喜欢佩奇的新鞋子。

sentences.EN: I like my new shoes so much.
sentences.CN: 我太喜欢我的新鞋子了。

sentences.EN: I don't want to ever take them off.
sentences.CN: 我永远都不想把它脱下来。

sentences.EN: Peppa wants to keep her new shoes on, even for her bath.
sentences.CN: 即使是洗澡，佩奇也不想脱下新鞋子。

sentences.EN: She still has her new shoes on.
Peppa even wants to wear her new shoes in bed!
sentences.CN: 佩奇甚至还穿着新鞋子睡觉！

sentences.EN: Peppa, are you sure you don't want to take your shoes off?
sentences.CN: 佩奇，你确定你不想脱下你的鞋子？

sentences.EN: I don't want to ever take my new shoes off, Mummy.
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我永远也不想脱下我的新鞋子。

sentences.EN: Very well. Goodnight, Peppa and George.
sentences.CN: 那好吧。晚安，佩奇和乔治。

sentences.EN: It has been raining all night and now the garden is very wet.
sentences.CN: 下了一整夜的雨现在花园很潮湿。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is wearing her boots.
Daddy Pig is wearing his boots.
Peppa is still wearing her new red shoes.
sentences.CN: 佩奇仍然穿着她的红色新鞋子。

sentences.EN: George is going to play in the wet grass.
sentences.CN: 乔治在潮湿的草丛里玩。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Peppa loves playing in the wet grass,
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕了。佩奇喜欢在潮湿的草丛里玩。

sentences.EN: but she doesn't want to get her new shoes wet.
sentences.CN: 但是她不想把新鞋子弄湿。

sentences.EN: I can't play in the wet grass, George.
sentences.CN: 乔治，我不能在潮湿的草丛里玩。

sentences.EN: George loves jumping in muddy puddles.

sentences.CN: 佩奇也喜欢在泥坑里跳。

sentences.EN: but she doesn't want to get her new shoes muddy.
sentences.CN: 但她不想新鞋子粘上泥。

sentences.EN: Mummy and Daddy love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 妈妈和爸爸喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: Everyone likes jumping in muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: Peppa is putting on her boots!
If you jump in muddy puddles, you must wear your boots!
sentences.CN: 如果你在泥坑里跳，你必须要穿上你的靴子！

sentences.EN: Today is the day of the school fete.
Peppa loves coming to the fete.
Candy Cat, Suzy Sheep,Danny Dog, Rebecca Rabbit and Pedro Pony.
sentences.CN: 小猫凯迪，小羊苏茜，小狗丹尼，小兔瑞贝卡和小马佩德罗。

sentences.EN: Me, too! What do you like best?
sentences.CN: 我也是！你最喜欢玩什么呢？

sentences.EN: I like the bouncy castle the best!
sentences.CN: 我最喜欢那个冲气城堡了！

sentences.EN: George, what do you like best?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你最喜欢玩什么呢？

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, there aren't any dinosaurs at the fete, George.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊，乔治，游园会里没有恐龙的。

sentences.EN: Maybe we can get you a dinosaur balloon.
sentences.CN: 也许我们可以找个恐龙气球。

sentences.EN: Are you sure they have dinosaur balloons,Daddy Pig?
sentences.CN: 你确定他们有恐龙气球，猪爸爸？

sentences.EN: Can George and I get our faces painted first?
sentences.CN: 乔治和我能先去在脸上画画吗？

sentences.EN: Miss Rabbit has painted Peppa's friends as tigers!
sentences.CN: 兔小姐把佩奇的朋友都画成了老虎！

sentences.EN: Now you look like a tiger!
sentences.CN: 现在你看起来像只老虎！

sentences.EN: Wow! I like your face, Suzy.
Peppa, would you like your face painted?
sentences.CN: 佩奇，你想在脸上画画吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, please. Can I be an elephant?
Oh, dear, I don't know how to do elephants.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊，我不知道怎么画大象。

sentences.EN: There you are, Peppa, now you're a tiger!
sentences.CN: 好了，佩奇，现在你是一只老虎了！

sentences.EN: George, what would you like to be?
A dinosaur? Er, how about a tiger instead?
sentences.CN: 恐龙？呃，改画一只老虎，怎样？

sentences.EN: Candy, please, can you teach us how to be tigers?
sentences.CN: 凯迪，你能教我们怎么扮做老虎吗？

sentences.EN: Okay! Tigers creep very very slowly,
sentences.CN: 好的！老虎走得非常非常地慢，

sentences.EN: Tigers like to lick themselves clean.
sentences.CN: 老虎喜欢把自己舔干净。

sentences.EN: But, best of all, when tigers are happy they purr.
sentences.CN: 但是，最棒的是，当老虎高兴了他们会发出咕噜声。

sentences.EN: And I'm teaching them to be proper tigers.
sentences.CN: 我还在教他们怎么做一只老虎。

sentences.EN: What do you little tigers want to do next?
sentences.CN: 那接下来你们这些小老虎们想做什么呢？

sentences.EN: That's right! We have to find George a dinosaur balloon!
sentences.CN: 说得对！我们得帮乔治找个恐龙气球！
你们每个都会得到气球的！

sentences.EN: Certainly! I've got lots of different ones.
sentences.CN: 当然可以！我有很多不同的气球。

sentences.EN: Can I have an elephant balloon? Please!
sentences.CN: 我能要一个大象气球吗？
我能要一个袋鼠气球吗？

sentences.EN: Most important of all, We need a dinosaur balloon for George.
sentences.CN: 最重要的是，我们要给乔治一个恐龙气球。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, I do not seem to have any dinosaur balloons.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊，我好像没有恐龙气球。

sentences.EN: Don't worry, George. I've got an idea.
Could we have two of the long balloons, please?
What is Daddy Pig doing with the balloons?
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸打算怎样摆弄气球呢？

sentences.EN: There! Can anyone guess what it is?
sentences.CN: 好了！大家能猜猜这是什么？

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has made a balloon dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸做了一只恐龙气球。

sentences.EN: Peppa loves bouncing on the bouncy castle.
sentences.CN: 佩奇喜欢在冲气城堡上玩！

sentences.EN: Everyone loves bouncing on the bouncy castle!
sentences.CN: 大家都喜欢在冲气城堡上玩！

sentences.EN: This is the best school fete, ever!
sentences.CN: 这是最棒的学校游园会了！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has made Mummy Pig breakfast in bed.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸给猪妈妈做了一份早餐端到床上。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George have made Mummy Pig a birthday card.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治给猪妈妈做了一张生日卡。

sentences.EN: Ooh! What a lovely birthday surprise!
sentences.CN: 哦！多么美好的生日惊喜！

sentences.EN: And there are more surprises to come!
sentences.CN: 还有更多的惊喜接着来哦！

sentences.EN: Quick! We have to get everything else ready!
sentences.CN: 快！我们得准备好其他的事了！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has made a birthday cake for Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸给猪妈妈做了一个生日蛋糕。

sentences.EN: We've just got to put the candles on!
Mummy Pig has finished her birthday breakfast.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈吃完她的生日早餐了。

sentences.EN: Oh, no. we're not ready yet.
sentences.CN: 哦，不行。我们还没有准备好呢。

sentences.EN: It's Mummy. Can I come in?
Is there something secret going on?
Er, no, nothing's going on. But you can't come in.
sentences.CN: 呃，没有，什么也没有。但是你不能进来。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig, why don't you relax in the sitting room?
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈，为什么你不在客厅里休息一下？

sentences.EN: Ok, Peppa, I think I know where the sitting room is!
sentences.CN: 好的，佩奇，我想我知道客厅在哪的！

sentences.EN: We need the same number of candles as Mummy's age.
sentences.CN: 我们需要插上与妈妈年龄一样多的蜡烛。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. We haven't got nearly enough candles.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。我们没有足够的蜡烛。

sentences.EN: I'll whisper it in your ear.
sentences.CN: 我在你耳边悄声告诉你。

sentences.EN: You know, I think three candles will be fine.
sentences.CN: 你知道吗，我想也许三支蜡烛就好了。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig's birthday cake is ready!
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈的生日蛋糕准备好了！

sentences.EN: We just have to put up the decorations in the sitting room.
sentences.CN: 我们还要装饰一下客厅。

sentences.EN: There you all are! I was getting a little bored.
sentences.CN: 你们都在啊！我感觉有点无聊了！

sentences.EN: Mummy? Would you like to have a nice walk in the garden?
sentences.CN: 妈妈？你想不想去花园里走走？

sentences.EN: Bye bye, Mummy! Have a lovely walk!
sentences.CN: 再见，妈妈！好好散散步吧！

sentences.EN: We'll call you when it's safe to come back in.
sentences.CN: 等可以回来时我们会叫你的。

sentences.EN: I'd forgotten what hard work birthdays were!
sentences.CN: 我都忘记了过个生日还是很麻烦的。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig, Peppa and George are decorating the sitting room.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，佩奇，乔治在装饰客厅。

sentences.EN: Granny and Grandpa Pig have arrived for Mummy Pig's birthday.
sentences.CN: 猪奶奶和猪爷爷也来庆祝猪妈妈的生日。

sentences.EN: Oh, I can't come in yet.
Daddy Pig, Peppa and George are doing secret things for my birthday.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，佩奇和乔治正在秘密地准备我的生日。

sentences.EN: Mummy! Would you like to come inside now?

sentences.CN: 眼睛要一直闭着哦，妈妈！

sentences.EN: Blow the candles out and make a wish!

sentences.CN: 妈妈，妈妈，打开你的礼物！

sentences.EN: Can you guess what it is?
sentences.CN: 你能猜到它是什么东西吗？
原来是一条漂亮的裙子！

sentences.EN: Now you just need somewhere nice to wear it.
sentences.CN: 现在你只需要某个好地方来配这件衣服。

sentences.EN: Two tickets to the theater! Tonight!
Mummy Pig loves going to the theater.
And Granny Pig and I are going to baby-sit the little ones.
sentences.CN: 猪奶奶和我会照顾小猪们的。

sentences.EN: I'm the luckiest Mummy in the whole world!
sentences.CN: 我是世上最幸运的妈妈！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are having their favorite food --- spaghetti!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在吃他们最喜欢的食物--意大利面！

sentences.EN: Ah, now we'll have a bit of quiet!
Peppa, maybe you should look in the mirror!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，也许你应该去镜子里看看！

sentences.EN: It's my tooth! It's fallen out!
sentences.CN: 这是我的牙齿！它掉下来了！

sentences.EN: Will I grow a new one, Mummy?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我还会长出新牙吗？

sentences.EN: It also means the Tooth Fairy will be paying you a visit.
sentences.CN: 它也意味着牙仙子会来看你的。

sentences.EN: If you put the tooth under your pillow tonight,
sentences.CN: 如果今晚你将牙齿放在你的枕头下，

sentences.EN: The Tooth Fairy will take the tooth.
And in its place, she will leave a shiny coin!
sentences.CN: 在原来的地方，她会放下一枚闪亮的金币！

sentences.EN: When I grow up,I want to be a Tooth Fairy!
sentences.CN: 等我长大了，我也要成为牙仙子！

sentences.EN: And what would you like to be when you grow up, George?
sentences.CN: 乔治，那你长大以后想做什么？
快点，乔治，是时候上床睡觉了！

sentences.EN: We don't want to miss the Tooth Fairy!
sentences.CN: 我们可不想错过牙仙子！

sentences.EN: Before going to bed, Peppa and George brush their teeth.
sentences.CN: 上床之前，佩奇和乔治在刷牙。

sentences.EN: I'm brushing my tooth so it is nice and clean for the Tooth Fairy.
sentences.CN: 我在刷我的牙齿，牙仙子就可以拿到好看又干净的牙齿了。

sentences.EN: Peppa cannot wait to get into bed.
sentences.CN: 佩奇迫不及待的想上床睡觉。

sentences.EN: Peppa is putting her tooth under the pillow for the Tooth Fairy.
sentences.CN: 佩奇将她的牙齿放在枕头下给牙仙子。

sentences.EN: George, I'm not going to sleep!
Let's both stay awake all night and see the Tooth Fairy!
sentences.CN: 我们一晚都不睡，看看牙仙子！

sentences.EN: This Tooth Fairy is very late!
sentences.CN: 这个牙仙子来得太晚了！

sentences.EN: The Tooth Fairy is taking a long time to arrive.
sentences.CN: 牙仙子要很久很久才来。
乔治，你听到了什么了吗？

sentences.EN: He was so tired, he has fallen asleep.
George is not very good at staying awake, but I am.
sentences.CN: 乔治不能一晚上不睡觉，但我可以。

sentences.EN: I am going to stay awake and see the Tooth Fairy.
Would you like this coin in return for your tooth?
sentences.CN: 你想用你的牙齿来换这枚金币吗？
真是一颗好看又干净的牙齿。

sentences.EN: Let's take a look under your pillow.
sentences.CN: 让我们看看你的枕头下。

sentences.EN: Look, Peppa! The Tooth Fairy has been and she's left you a coin!
sentences.CN: 看，佩奇！牙仙子已经来过了，还留了一枚金币！

sentences.EN: Well, maybe I fell asleep just for a Little bit...
sentences.CN: 好吧，也许我只是小睡了一会。。。

sentences.EN: Next time, I will stay awake, and I will see the Tooth Fairy!
sentences.CN: 下次，我会一直醒着而且我会看到牙仙子的！

sentences.EN: Today, Peppa and her family are going for a drive in their red car.
sentences.CN: 今天，佩奇和家人开着红色小车打算出游。

sentences.EN: Shall we have the roof down?
Peppa and George love their car.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢他们的车。

sentences.EN: And our car loves us, too! Don't you?
sentences.CN: 我们的车也喜欢我们，对嘛？

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, the car does not sound very well.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕，车子听起来不对劲。

sentences.EN: Let's take it to Granddad Dog's Garage.
sentences.CN: 让我们把车开去狗爷爷的修车厂吧。

sentences.EN: That's a good idea, Mummy Pig.
he is very good at mending cars.
Your car does not sound very well.
sentences.CN: 你的车子听上去有点问题。

sentences.EN: Can you fix it, please, Granddad Dog?
sentences.CN: 请问你能不能修好它呢，狗爷爷？

sentences.EN: Yes......but it will take all day.
sentences.CN: 可以。。。但是它需要一整天。

sentences.EN: We wanted to go for a drive in our car.
sentences.CN: 我们本来想开车出去兜风的。

sentences.EN: You can borrow this new car while I fix yours.
sentences.CN: 我修车时可以把这辆新车借给你们。

sentences.EN: Would you like the roof down?
sentences.CN: 你们想把车篷放下来吗？

sentences.EN: I'll just press this red button.
sentences.CN: 我只要按下这个红色按钮就行了。

sentences.EN: I will have fixed your car.
sentences.CN: 我就会修好你们的车子的。

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family like the new blue car.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和家人喜欢这辆蓝色新汽车。

sentences.EN: There are so many buttons in this new car.
sentences.CN: 这辆新车里有很多按钮。

sentences.EN: What does the green button do, Daddy?
sentences.CN: 这个绿色的按钮是干什么的，爸爸？

sentences.EN: Daddy! Make the magic windows go down.
sentences.CN: 爸爸！把魔法窗户降下去吧。

sentences.EN: What does the blue button do?
sentences.CN: 这个蓝色的按钮是干什么的？
我不知道。让我们试试看。

sentences.EN: No, we can't keep it, Peppa.
sentences.CN: 不行，我们不能留下它，佩奇。

sentences.EN: We've only borrowed it for today.
sentences.CN: 我们今天只是借用一下。

sentences.EN: Oh, no, I think it's going to rain.
Yes, I'll just put the roof up.
sentences.CN: 是的，我来把车篷升起来。

sentences.EN: Now, which is the button to close the roof?
sentences.CN: 可是，哪个按钮是用来升起车篷的？

sentences.EN: The new car has squirted Daddy Pig with water.
sentences.CN: 新车朝猪爸爸脸上喷了一脸的水。

sentences.EN: Silly Daddy, that's not the roof!
sentences.CN: 糊涂爸爸，那不是控制车篷的！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has forgotten which button closes the roof.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸忘了是哪个按钮来关车篷的。

sentences.EN: I don't think this car likes me!
sentences.CN: 我觉得这辆车不喜欢我！
让我们来试一下这个红色的按钮。

sentences.EN: Can we open the roof again?
sentences.CN: 我们能把车篷再打开吗？

sentences.EN: Er, yes. which button was it?
Granddad Dog has fixed the car.
sentences.CN: 狗爷爷已经修好了车子。
你们的车子已经修好了。

sentences.EN: Thank you, Granddad Dog, and keep the change.
sentences.CN: 谢谢你，狗爷爷，不用找零钱了。

sentences.EN: It's good to get our old car back again!
sentences.CN: 还是开我们的旧车感觉好！

sentences.EN: I liked the new car but I like our old car better.
sentences.CN: 我喜欢那辆新车，但我更喜欢我们的旧车。

sentences.EN: And I think our old car likes us, too. Don't you?
sentences.CN: 我觉得我们的旧车也喜欢我们，对嘛？

sentences.EN: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig are making a treasure hunt for Peppa and Geroge.
sentences.CN: 猪奶奶和猪爷爷正在给佩奇和乔治准备寻宝游戏。

sentences.EN: Granny Pig is drawing the treasure map.
Grandpa Pig is burying the treasure in a secret place in the garden.
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷正在将宝藏藏在花园里的一个秘密地点。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George will be here soon!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治很快就来这了！

sentences.EN: No need to panic, Granny Pig!
Peppa and her family are here!
Grandpa Pig just finished in time!

sentences.CN: 你们好啊，我的小可爱们！

sentences.EN: Peppa, George, we've made you a treasure hunt!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，我们给你们准备了寻宝活动！

sentences.EN: Somewhere in the garden is buried treasure!
sentences.CN: 花园里的某个地方藏了宝藏哦！

sentences.EN: You have to look for it.
Here's a treasure map for Peppa.
And George can wear my pirate hat.
sentences.CN: 乔治可以戴上我的海盗帽。

sentences.EN: The map is a bit difficult.
Er. It is a bit difficult.
Daddy Pig, you're holding the map upside down!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，你把地图拿反了！

sentences.EN: It's easy! The red cross shows where the treasure is!
sentences.CN: 太简单了！红色叉的地方就是宝藏的地方！

sentences.EN: But where in the garden are those two apple trees?
sentences.CN: 但是花园的什么地方有两棵苹果树呢？

sentences.EN: The first clue is in a bottle.
sentences.CN: 第一个提示在一个瓶子里。

sentences.EN: Peppa has found the first clue.
sentences.CN: 佩奇找到了第一个提示了。

sentences.EN: Let's see what the message says.
sentences.CN: 让我们看看纸条上说什么。

sentences.EN: Oh it's a message from a pirate!
sentences.CN: 哦，它是来自海盗的纸条！

sentences.EN: Mummy? Can you read the pirate's message?
sentences.CN: 妈妈？你能帮我念一下海盗纸条吗？

sentences.EN: Hmm... This pirate has very bad handwriting.
sentences.CN: 嗯。。。这个海盗的字写得真难看。
海盗的字写得挺不错的。

sentences.EN: No, I can't make it out at all.
The pirate has clearly written,"Follow the arrows!"
sentences.CN: 海盗写得很清楚，“跟着箭头走！”

sentences.EN: George has found the second clue!
sentences.CN: 乔治找到了第二个提示！

sentences.EN: Sticks in the shape of an arrow!
Peppa and George are following the arrows.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在跟着箭头走。

sentences.EN: Peppa has found the next clue. A key!
sentences.CN: 佩奇找到了下一个提示。一个钥匙！

sentences.EN: Now you just have to find the treasure chest that it unlocks.
sentences.CN: 现在你只要找到宝箱，然后打开它。

sentences.EN: But there aren't any more clues.
sentences.CN: 但是没有更多的线索了。

sentences.EN: Maybe you should take another look at the map.
sentences.CN: 也许你应该再看一看地图。

sentences.EN: Look, Peppa, the map has two apple trees on it.
sentences.CN: 看，佩奇，地图上有两棵苹果树。

sentences.EN: So the treasure must be here!
sentences.CN: 所以宝藏一定在这里了！

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. There doesn't seem to be anything here...
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊。这看起来不像有东西在。。。

sentences.EN: Hang on! There is something here!
I've got the key to open it!
Gold coins! They must be worth a fortune!
sentences.CN: 居然是金币！它们一定很值钱！

sentences.EN: And there's a chocolate coin for everybody.
sentences.CN: 每个人都有巧克力金币。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love chocolate coins.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢巧克力金币。
大家都喜欢巧克力金币。

sentences.EN: this is the best treasure hunt ever!
sentences.CN: 这是最好玩的寻宝游戏！

sentences.EN: Mummy and Daddy Pig have just made breakfast for Peppa and George.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸刚给佩奇和乔治做好早餐。

sentences.EN: Peppa has red spots on her face!
sentences.CN: 佩奇脸上长满了红点点。

sentences.EN: Mummy, I don't feel very well.
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我感觉有点不舒服。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, Peppa. You don't look very well.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊，佩奇。你看上去很不好。

sentences.EN: Don't worry. I'll ring Dr. Brown-Bear.
sentences.CN: 别担心。我打电话给棕熊医生。

sentences.EN: Her face is covered in red spots!
Put Peppa to bed and I'll come straight round.
sentences.CN: 让佩奇在床上躺着，我一会儿就过来。

sentences.EN: Dr. Brown Bear has come to make Peppa better.
sentences.CN: 棕熊医生过来给佩奇治病了。

sentences.EN: Hello, Peppa, how are you today?
sentences.CN: 你好啊，佩奇，你今天感觉怎么样？
嗯。。。不是什么严重的问题

sentences.EN: Peppa has just got a rash.
sentences.CN: 佩奇只是得了疹子而已。

sentences.EN: The rash will clear up quickly.
But if you like, I can give you just a little medicine.
sentences.CN: 但是如果你想吃药，我可以开一点点药给你。

sentences.EN: I'm afraid it doesn't taste very nice.
sentences.CN: 恐怕它的味道不是很好。

sentences.EN: You are a brave little one for taking it so well.
sentences.CN: 你一下子就吃完药了，真是个勇敢的小朋友。

sentences.EN: I'll call back later to check that she is better.
sentences.CN: 我稍后会来看看她有没有好点。

sentences.EN: Oh, yes, she can have visitors.
sentences.CN: 哦，当然可以，她可以有人来看望。
这疹子不会传染的。再见！

sentences.EN: Mummy, can I get up now?
Dr. Brown Bear says that you must stay in bed for a little bit, Peppa.
sentences.CN: 棕熊医生说你必须卧室休息一会，佩奇。

sentences.EN: Dr. Brown Bear did say you could have visitors.
sentences.CN: 棕熊医生说了你可以让人来探望你。

sentences.EN: Suzy Sheep is Peppa's best friend.
sentences.CN: 小羊苏西是佩奇最好的朋友。
我来打电话给苏西的妈妈。

sentences.EN: May Peppa talk with Suzy, please?
sentences.CN: 佩奇可以跟苏西通话吗？

sentences.EN: I have red spots on my face.
Yes, Dr. Brown Bear was here!
He said I was not very well and that I was very brave.
sentences.CN: 他说我不太好但我很勇敢。

sentences.EN: I have to stay in bed!
Dr. Brown Bear gave me medicine that tasted really horrible!
sentences.CN: 棕熊医生开了药给我，那药很难吃。

sentences.EN: I'm going to wear my nurse's outfit!!!
Suzy Sheep has come to see Peppa.
Suzy is wearing her nurse's costume.
Danny Dog and Rebecca Rabbit have come along, too.
sentences.CN: 小狗丹尼和小兔瑞贝卡也来了。

sentences.EN: I am not very well, Suzy.
I have to stay in bed.
What can we do to make you better?
sentences.CN: 我们能做点什么让你感觉好些？

sentences.EN: You could get me some orange juice.
sentences.CN: 你们可以帮我倒些橙汁来

sentences.EN: Peppa seems to be quite enjoying herself.
sentences.CN: 佩奇看上去很享受生病。

sentences.EN: Ask my mummy if I could have some ice cream.
sentences.CN: 问问我妈妈我能不能吃些冰淇淋。

sentences.EN: And Rebecca,could you bring me some flowers from the garden?
sentences.CN: 瑞贝卡，你可以帮我去花园采些花吗？

sentences.EN: Dr. Brown Bear is here, to see if Peppa is better.
sentences.CN: 棕熊医生来了，来看看佩奇是否好点。

sentences.EN: Ah, good, the nurse is already here!
sentences.CN: 啊，好，护士小姐已经来了！

sentences.EN: Err... I'm not a real nurse, it's just pretend.
sentences.CN: 呃。。。我不是真正的护士，我只是在扮演。

sentences.EN: I see. Would you like me to take a look myseIf?
sentences.CN: 我明白了。那你介意我亲自去看看吗？

sentences.EN: I say! No more red spots!
Aren't I still a bit ill?
I think I should stay in bed a little bit more.
sentences.CN: 我觉得我应该在床上再多躺一会。

sentences.EN: Hmm.. I fancy a game with this ball in the garden!!
sentences.CN: 嗯。我想要去花园里玩一会球！！

sentences.EN: Well, I never! A complete recovery!
sentences.CN: 好吧，我还从没看到过这么快就康复的！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are very excited today.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治今天非常兴奋。

sentences.EN: Mummy! Can we go and play in the snow?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我们可以去玩雪吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, but it's very cold outside,so you must wrap up warm.
sentences.CN: 可以，但是外面非常冷，所以你们必须穿暖和些。

sentences.EN: And don't forget to wear your hats,and scarves and gloves.
sentences.CN: 还有不要忘记戴上你们的帽子，围巾和手套。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George must wear their hats and scarves and gloves.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治必须戴上他们的帽子围巾和手套。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are making footprints in the snow.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在雪地里踩脚印。
乔治，让我们来打雪仗吧！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are having a lot of fun.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治玩得很开心。

sentences.EN: George, come back, you little piggy!
Oh, dear. Maybe this game is getting a little too rough.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。也许这游戏玩得有点过火了。
乔治！让我们来堆雪人吧！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are making a snowman.
George, this is the snowman's body.
sentences.CN: 乔治，这是雪人的身体了。

sentences.EN: Now, they make the snowman's head.
sentences.CN: 现在，他们在堆雪人的头。

sentences.EN: Now, he needs arms and eyes and a mouth!
sentences.CN: 现在，他需要胳膊，眼睛和嘴巴！

sentences.EN: George has found some sticks for the snowman's arms.
sentences.CN: 乔治找了几根树枝来做雪人的胳膊。

sentences.EN: Peppa has found some stones for the snowman's eyes and mouth.
sentences.CN: 佩奇找了几块石头来做雪人的眼睛和嘴巴。

sentences.EN: Now the snowman needs a nose.
sentences.CN: 现在雪人需要一个鼻子。

sentences.EN: Peppa has got a carrot, to make the snowman's nose.
sentences.CN: 佩奇找了根胡萝卜来做雪人的鼻子。

sentences.EN: But maybe he is bit cold.
The snowman needs some clothes to keep him warm.
sentences.CN: 雪人需要穿些衣服来保暖。

sentences.EN: George has found some clothes to keep the snowman nice and warm!
sentences.CN: 乔治找来了一些衣服来给雪人保暖！

sentences.EN: The snowman is wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.
sentences.CN: 雪人戴上了他的帽子围巾和手套。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is wearing her hat and scarf and gloves.
sentences.CN: 妈妈戴着她的帽子，围巾和手套来了。

sentences.EN: That is the best snowman I have ever seen!
sentences.CN: 这是我见过的最好的雪人了！

sentences.EN: He isn't wearing his hat and scarf and gloves.
sentences.CN: 他没有戴着他的帽子，围巾和手套。

sentences.EN: Daddy, why aren't you wearing your hat and scarf and gloves?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，你为什么不戴上你的帽子，围巾和手套？

sentences.EN: I don't know where they are!
sentences.CN: 我不知道他们跑哪去了！

sentences.EN: I think I know where Daddy's hat, scarf and gloves are
sentences.CN: 我想我知道爸爸的帽子，围巾和手套在哪了

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig's hat and scarf and gloves are on the snowman!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸的帽子，围巾和手套都在雪人身上！

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family are going out for the day.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和家人今天要出去玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George,today we are going to Windy Castle!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，今天我们要去风息堡！

sentences.EN: It's a castle on a very high hill!
sentences.CN: 是座落在高山上的一座城堡！

sentences.EN: Windy Castle sounds like a boring thing for boys.
sentences.CN: 风息堡听起来像是男孩子喜欢玩的，有点无聊。

sentences.EN: There's a great view from the top of Windy Castle.
sentences.CN: 风息堡上面的风景非常美。

sentences.EN: You can even see Granny and Grandpa's house!
sentences.CN: 你甚至还可以看到奶奶和爷爷的房子！

sentences.EN: I'll map-read and Mummy Pig will drive.
sentences.CN: 我来看地图，猪妈妈负责开车。

sentences.EN: When you map-read,we always get lost and you get grumpy.
sentences.CN: 你看地图，我们总会迷路，然后你会变得很焦躁。

sentences.EN: We will not get lost and I will not get grumpy.
sentences.CN: 我们是不会迷路的，我也不会变焦躁。

sentences.EN: Would you like to play a game?

sentences.CN: 是的。让我们玩“我要你猜”！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has to secretly look at something and the others have to guess what it is.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸偷偷看个东西然后让其他人来猜猜是什么。

sentences.EN: I spy with my little eye, something colored ''red''.
sentences.CN: 我的小眼睛看到一样红色的东西。
红色？我的裙子！它是红色的！
对了！是我们红色的汽车。

sentences.EN: My go. I spy with my little eye, something ''blue''
sentences.CN: 我来。我的小眼睛看到一个蓝色的东西。

sentences.EN: Is it something in the car?
The sky! The blue sky! I win.
sentences.CN: 天空啊！蓝色的天空！我赢了.

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig? Do you know where we are?
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸？你知道我们在哪吗？

sentences.EN: I know exactly where we are.
sentences.CN: 我很确切地知道我们在哪。

sentences.EN: Although... this road doesn't look the same as it does on the map.
sentences.CN: 虽然。。。这路看起来和地图上的不太一样。

sentences.EN: So how do we get to Windy Castle from here?
sentences.CN: 那么我们从这里怎么去风息堡？

sentences.EN: I know, we can ring Granny and Grandpa.
sentences.CN: 我知道了，我们可以打电话给猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

sentences.EN: There's no need to ring Granny and Grandpa.
sentences.CN: 没有必要打电话给猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

sentences.EN: I'll get us to Windy Castle, if it takes me all day.
sentences.CN: 我会让大家到达风息堡的，即使花上一整天。

sentences.EN: Grandpa Pig,we've got a bit lost on the way to Windy Castle.
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷，我们在去风息堡的路上有点迷路了。

sentences.EN: Is Daddy Pig doing the map-reading?
sentences.CN: 是不是猪爸爸在看地图啊？

sentences.EN: Yes, Daddy Pig is doing the map-reading.
And he's a bit grumpy at the moment.
keep on the main road until you see Windy Castle up ahead.
sentences.CN: 你们只要沿着主路一直开，就会看到风息堡了。

sentences.EN: We follow the main road and look out for Windy Castle.
sentences.CN: 我们沿着主路开，就会看到风息堡了。

sentences.EN: Come on, car! You can make it!
Peppa and her family have arrived at Windy Castle.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和家人到达风息堡了。

sentences.EN: Let's go inside. The view from the top is fantastic!
sentences.CN: 我们进去吧。城堡顶上的风景美极了！

sentences.EN: Mummy, is that Granny and Grandpa's house?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，那是不是奶奶和爷爷的房子？

sentences.EN: Let's take a look through the telescope.
sentences.CN: 让我们用望远镜看看吧。

sentences.EN: Yes, but you must let George look next.
sentences.CN: 可以，但你看完就得让乔治看。

sentences.EN: The telescope makes everything look bigger.
I can see Granny and Grandpa!
sentences.CN: 我可以看到奶奶和爷爷了！

sentences.EN: George is waving at Granny and Grandpa Pig.
sentences.CN: 乔治在对着奶奶和爷爷挥手。

sentences.EN: Granny and Grandpa are too far away to see you waving!
sentences.CN: 奶奶和爷爷离得太远了看不到你在挥手的！

sentences.EN: I know! We can ring them!
sentences.CN: 我知道了！我们可以打电话给他们！

sentences.EN: Grandpa Pig! We can see you from Windy Castle!
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷！我们可以从风息堡看到你们！

sentences.EN: Granny and Grandpa are waving at us!
sentences.CN: 奶奶和爷爷正朝着我们挥手呢！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are playing in the garden.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在花园里玩。

sentences.EN: You threw the ball too hard, George!
sentences.CN: 你的球扔得太大力了，乔治！

sentences.EN: So the rules say, I win!
sentences.CN: 所以按规则来说，我赢了！

sentences.EN: Now it's my turn. I win again!
sentences.CN: 现在轮到我了。我又赢了！

sentences.EN: Peppa, George. Today your big cousin Chloe is coming to visit!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，今天你们的堂姐克洛伊会来家里玩！

sentences.EN: George, Chloe is a big girl,like me.
sentences.CN: 乔治，克洛伊像我一样是个大姑娘了。

sentences.EN: So, don't be sad if she finds you too Little to play with.
sentences.CN: 所以，如果她觉得你太小不和你玩，你不要伤心哦。

sentences.EN: I'm sure Chloe will play with both of you.
sentences.CN: 我相信克洛伊会和你们俩一起玩的。

sentences.EN: Aunty Pig has brought Chloe to spend the day at Peppa's house.
sentences.CN: 猪伯母带克洛伊来佩奇家里玩了。

sentences.EN: Chloe is Peppa and George's cousin.
sentences.CN: 克洛伊是佩奇和乔治的堂姐。

sentences.EN: Chloe is a bit older than Peppa and George.
sentences.CN: 克洛伊比佩奇和乔治大一点点。

sentences.EN: Do you want to play a game?

sentences.CN: 是的！我们来玩“你跑我追”!

sentences.EN: That's a game for Little children.
sentences.CN: 那可是小孩子玩的游戏。

sentences.EN: We only play "Catch"because George likes it.
sentences.CN: 我们玩“你跑我追”只是因为是乔治喜欢这个游戏。

sentences.EN: Okay. Let's play it for George.
sentences.CN: 好吧。那我们陪乔治玩吧。

sentences.EN: Do you play with the proper rules or the baby rules?
sentences.CN: 你是按大人的规则玩还是按小朋友的规则玩？
开始了。佩奇！你是追的人。

sentences.EN: Peppa is "it". She has to chase Chloe and George.
sentences.CN: 佩奇是那个追的人。她要追克洛伊和乔治。

sentences.EN: I'm going to easily catch you! You're so Little!
sentences.CN: 要抓住你太简单了！你那么小！

sentences.EN: That's not fair! You're helping George!
sentences.CN: 那样不公平！你在帮乔治！

sentences.EN: Do you want me to help you?
No! I don't need help.I'm a big girl like you.
sentences.CN: 不，我不需要帮忙。我和你一样是个大姑娘了。

sentences.EN: Come on, then, Peppa! Try and catch us!

sentences.CN: 我们可以玩别的游戏吗？

sentences.EN: Okay, I know a really good game for big children.
sentences.CN: 可以啊，我知道一个真正适合大孩子玩的好游戏。

sentences.EN: One person is the "Sly Fox"and the others creep up on them.
sentences.CN: 由一个人来做“狡猾的狐狸”其他人悄悄地走上前。

sentences.EN: Me! Me! I want to be the "Sly Fox"!
sentences.CN: 我来！我来！我要扮“狡猾的狐狸”！

sentences.EN: While her back is turned, the others creep up on her.
sentences.CN: 当她转过身去时，其他人悄悄地走向她。

sentences.EN: But if Peppa turns and sees someone move，
sentences.CN: 但如果佩奇转过身看到谁在动

sentences.EN: they have to go back to the start!
sentences.CN: 那他们就得走回去重新开始！

sentences.EN: You moved before I was ready!
sentences.CN: 我还没准备好你就动了！

sentences.EN: The rules say I can move when I like.
sentences.CN: 规则说我随时都可以动。

sentences.EN: Now it's Chloe's turn to be the "Sly Fox".
sentences.CN: 现在轮到克洛伊来做“狡猾的狐狸”了。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George must stay very still.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治必须保持不动。

sentences.EN: Peppa! I saw you move! Back to the start!
sentences.CN: 佩奇！我看到你动了！回到原位重新开始！

sentences.EN: It's not fair! You looked too long!
The rules say, I can look as long as I want.
sentences.CN: 规则说，我想看多久就多久。

sentences.EN: Can we play a different game?
sentences.CN: 我们可以玩别的游戏吗？

sentences.EN: But as long as it's a grown-up game.
sentences.CN: 但只能是大人玩的游戏。
我们来玩我最喜欢的游戏吧！

sentences.EN: George, do you know what Peppa's favorite game is?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你知道佩奇最喜欢的游戏是什么？

sentences.EN: Peppa's favorite game is jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 佩奇最喜欢的游戏是在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: George, if you jump in puddles,you must wear your boots!
sentences.CN: 乔治，如果你想跳到泥坑里玩，你必须穿上你的靴子！

sentences.EN: I've brought some boots for you too, Chloe!
sentences.CN: 我也给你带了一双靴子，克洛伊！

sentences.EN: I'm too grown-up to jump in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 我已经是大人了不能在泥坑里跳。

sentences.EN: George loves jumping in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 乔治喜欢跳到泥坑里玩。

sentences.EN: Secretly, Peppa would love to jump in the puddle.
sentences.CN: 其实，佩奇也喜欢跳到泥坑里玩。

sentences.EN: But she wants to look grown-up.
sentences.CN: 但是她想让自己看上去像个大人。

sentences.EN: I hear there's some puddle jumping going on!
sentences.CN: 我听说这有跳泥坑可以玩！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig love jumping in muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸也喜欢跳到泥坑里玩！

sentences.EN: Maybe there's a rule that says, big girls can jump in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 也许有条规则是，大姑娘也可以跳到泥坑里玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa and Chloe love jumping up and down in muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和克洛伊喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles,even grown-up girls!
sentences.CN: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去，即使是大姑娘也喜欢！

sentences.EN: And Mummy Pig has a surprise for everyone.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈准备了一个惊喜给大家。

sentences.EN: Today is a day for pancakes!
I'm the expert at flipping the pancakes over!
sentences.CN: 我是一个抛煎饼的高手！

sentences.EN: Last time you got a bit grumpy when you dropped the pancake on the floor.
sentences.CN: 上次，当你将煎饼掉在地上时你可有点焦躁哦

sentences.EN: There was a problem with the frying pan.
Mummy. Can we help make the pancakes, please?
sentences.CN: 妈妈。我们可以帮忙做煎饼吗？

sentences.EN: Yes. You can help me make the batter.
sentences.CN: 可以。你们可以帮我做面糊。

sentences.EN: First, I put some flour in the bowl.
sentences.CN: 首先，我把面粉放进碗里。

sentences.EN: And I give it all a stir.

sentences.CN: 妈妈，可以让我来搅拌吗？

sentences.EN: George wants to stir as well.
You two sit at the table while I cook the pancakes.
sentences.CN: 我做煎饼时，你俩坐在桌旁。
