sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is going to flip the pancake over!
sentences.CN: 妈妈要把煎饼翻过来啦！

sentences.EN: You could flip it higher,Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 你可以翻得更高点，猪妈妈。

sentences.EN: You can show us how, when you flip your own pancake, Daddy Pig.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，等你做你自己的那个煎饼时，你可以教教我们。

sentences.EN: This first pancake is for George.
sentences.CN: 第一个煎饼是给乔治的。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig pours a little syrup on George's pancake.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈倒了些糖浆在乔治的煎饼上。

sentences.EN: Hmmm... you could flip it higher, Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 嗯。。。你可以翻得更高点的，猪妈妈。

sentences.EN: You will get a chance to show me when you flip you own pancake, Daddy Pig.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸，等你翻你自己的煎饼时你就可以给我展示了。

sentences.EN: This pancake is for Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 这个煎饼是给猪妈妈的。

sentences.EN: You still aren't flipping them high enough,Mummy Pig.
sentences.CN: 你仍然抛得不够高，猪妈妈。

sentences.EN: The next pancake is yours, Daddy Pig.
sentences.CN: 下一个煎饼是你的，猪爸爸。

sentences.EN: So now you can show us how it should be done.
sentences.CN: 现在你可以给我们展示一下怎么做了。

sentences.EN: The secret of making a good pancake is to flip it high into the air.
sentences.CN: 做出好吃的煎饼的秘密是把它翻到高空中。

sentences.EN: Oh...maybe that was just a bit too high.
What a shame, that was the last pancake.
sentences.CN: 真可惜，这可是最后一个煎饼。

sentences.EN: It should be a simple matter to get it down.
sentences.CN: 应该很容易把它拿下来。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Daddy Pig cannot reach his pancake.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕。猪爸爸够不着他的煎饼。

sentences.EN: I think I know a way to get it down.
sentences.CN: 我想我知道一个办法让它落下来。

sentences.EN: What is Mummy Pig planning to do?
On the count of three,We all have to start jumping up and down.
Now Daddy Pig has his pancake.
sentences.CN: 现在猪爸爸拿到煎饼了。

sentences.EN: Daddy has a pancake on his head!
sentences.CN: 爸爸的煎饼掉到了他头上！

sentences.EN: Syrup on your pancake, Daddy Pig?
sentences.CN: 你的煎饼要放糖浆吗，猪爸爸？

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are going out for the evening.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸今晚外出。

sentences.EN: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig are going to baby-sit.
sentences.CN: 猪奶奶和猪爷爷来照料孩子。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George. Into your beds! Quick!
Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are leaving for their evening out.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸离开家了。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are so good.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治表现得很好。

sentences.EN: They just fell asleep when Mummy Pig told them to!
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈一说他们就去睡觉了！

sentences.EN: I wonder if we should check upstairs...
sentences.CN: 我想我们是不是该上楼看一下。。。
好吧，我从来没有见过这么快睡着的。

sentences.EN: So, it wasn't Peppa and George making all that noise.
sentences.CN: 所以，刚才的声音不是佩奇和乔治发出来的哦。

sentences.EN: I think they really have fallen asleep.
Gardening. Today we are talking about ''Roses''.
sentences.CN: 园艺。今天我们来谈谈玫瑰花。

sentences.EN: The Gavesgate is a particularly thorny rose.
To prune it, start by lopping off the head
sentences.CN: 修剪它时，先剪掉它的头

sentences.EN: and then snip away the budding shoots.
You should be in bed asleep!
sentences.CN: 你们俩不是应该睡着了吗！

sentences.EN: George and I are not sleepy at all.
Can we watch TV with you?
sentences.CN: 我们可以和你们一起看电视吗？

sentences.EN: Well... I suppose watching a little TV might make you sleepy.
sentences.CN: 好吧。。。我想看一会电视你们就会困的。

sentences.EN: Icelandic Roses are a rare treat for the discerning horticulturist.
sentences.CN: 冰岛玫瑰对于园艺爱好者来说是非常稀有的品种

sentences.EN: But they are prone to lobbing in temperate habitats.
sentences.CN: 但是温暖的环境不利它们生长。

sentences.EN: Grandpa Pig? Can you play that game
sentences.CN: 爷爷？你能和我们玩游戏吗？

sentences.EN: where you throw us up and catch us?
sentences.CN: 把我们抛到空中又接住的游戏

sentences.EN: Okay, but just one turn each!
sentences.CN: 好的，但是一次只能一个人！

sentences.EN: Phew... You seem heavier than before.
sentences.CN: 哎哟。。。你好像比以前重了。

sentences.EN: Maybe Grandpa Pig is a bit tired.
I know! Granny Pig, let's play catch!
sentences.CN: 我知道！奶奶，我们来玩捉人游戏吧！

sentences.EN: You're ''It''! Catch us if you can!
sentences.CN: 你是捉人的那个！来捉我们呀！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are back home.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸回家了。

sentences.EN: I hope our little piggies are asleep.
sentences.CN: 希望我们的小猪们都睡着了。

sentences.EN: And so are the big piggies!
Peppa is going to her first ballet lesson.
sentences.CN: 佩奇去上她的第一节芭蕾舞课。

sentences.EN: This is Madame Gazelle, the ballet teacher.
sentences.CN: 这是羚羊夫人，芭蕾舞老师。

sentences.EN: Ah, ho! You must be young Peppa.
Welcome to your first lesson of the ballet.
sentences.CN: 欢迎你来上第一节芭蕾舞课。

sentences.EN: Candy Cat, Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog,Rebecca Rabbit, and Pedro Pony.
sentences.CN: 小猫凯迪，小羊苏西，小狗丹尼，小兔瑞贝卡和小马佩德罗。

sentences.EN: Children, today we have a new pupil, Peppa Pig.
sentences.CN: 孩子们，今天我们有个新同学，佩奇。

sentences.EN: Now Peppa, run and join your friends.
sentences.CN: 现在，佩奇去你朋友们那吧。
孩子们，我们开始练习半蹲。

sentences.EN: Now a Little jump, petit jete.
sentences.CN: 现在练习小跳，脚交织式跳跃。

sentences.EN: With grace and beauty. Petit jete!
sentences.CN: 动作要优雅和美丽。 脚交织式跳跃！

sentences.EN: The ballet lesson is a lot of fun!
sentences.CN: 芭蕾舞课真是太有意思了！

sentences.EN: Imagine that you are beautiful swans!
sentences.CN: 想象你们是一只漂亮的天鹅！

sentences.EN: And what noise do you think a swan might make?
sentences.CN: 你们觉得天鹅的声音是怎么样的呢？

sentences.EN: Mummy! Mummy! We all danced as swans!
sentences.CN: 妈妈！妈妈！我们都像天鹅一样跳舞啊！

sentences.EN: I had to dance beautifully and gracefully!
sentences.CN: 我要跳得既漂亮又优雅才行！

sentences.EN: Can I show you how I did it?
sentences.CN: 我给你看看是怎么跳的吧？

sentences.EN: Then you can show Daddy Pig, and George, and me.
sentences.CN: 然后你再跳给爸爸，乔治和我看。

sentences.EN: Peppa and Mummy Pig are home!
I'm going to show you how to do ballet!
sentences.CN: 我要让你们看看怎么跳芭蕾舞！

sentences.EN: But you, George, and Mummy will find it very hard.
sentences.CN: 但对于你，乔治和妈妈就很难了。

sentences.EN: Good. Now, George, Daddy and Mummy,you must copy what I do.
sentences.CN: 好了。现在，乔治，爸爸和妈妈，你们必须照我的动作来做。
羚羊夫人用了一些好笑的词。

sentences.EN: But really, it's just bending your knees and jumping.
sentences.CN: 但是其实，只是弯起你的膝盖然后跳起来。

sentences.EN: Daddy! You know the funny words!
sentences.CN: 爸爸！你居然知道那个好笑的词！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and I used to be quite good at ballet!
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和我以前芭蕾舞跳得很好的！

sentences.EN: Our favorite was the pas de deux!
sentences.CN: 我们最喜欢的舞是双人舞！

sentences.EN: Ooofff! That wasn't quite how I remembered it.
sentences.CN: 喔！我记得好像不是这样的。

sentences.EN: Maybe we should leave the ballet to Peppa!
sentences.CN: 或许我们还是让佩奇来表演芭蕾舞吧！

sentences.EN: Yes, I am the best at it!
It is a lovely, sunny day.
sentences.CN: 今天是个阳光灿烂的日子。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are having a picnic.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在外面野餐。

sentences.EN: Here's some orange juice for you, Teddy.
Here's some orange juice for you, Mr.Dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 倒些橙汁给你，恐龙先生。

sentences.EN: Would Teddy or Mr.Dinosaur like a cookie?
sentences.CN: 泰迪和恐龙先生喜欢吃点饼干吗？

sentences.EN: So Peppa and George can eat all the cookies.
sentences.CN: 所以佩奇和乔治可以吃掉所有的饼干。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George! Quick, come inside the house!
Mummy! There was a loud ''bang'' sound!
It means there will be a thunderstorm with lots of rain.
sentences.CN: 它意味着狂风暴雨马上就来了。

sentences.EN: Quick! Into the house before the rain starts!
No need to panic, the rain is still a long way off.
sentences.CN: 不要惊慌，这雨要很久才会下的。

sentences.EN: The sky is getting darker and darker.
There is going to be a thunderstorm.
sentences.CN: 一场暴风雨即将到来了。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George, did you bring all your toys in from the garden?
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，你们所有的玩具都从花园拿回来了吗？

sentences.EN: Teddy! I left Teddy in the garden!
sentences.CN: 泰迪！我把泰迪落在花园了！

sentences.EN: As I thought,plenty of time before it rains.
sentences.CN: 正如我所料，离下雨还有很多时间。

sentences.EN: Yes, poor Teddy! Let's get him dry!
sentences.CN: 是的，可怜的泰迪！让我们把他擦干吧！

sentences.EN: There you are, Teddy! All dry!
The rain is coming in the house!
Oh, dear! What can we do, Daddy Pig?
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕！我们该怎么办，猪爸爸？

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is using a bucket to catch the drips.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸用一个水桶来接雨水。

sentences.EN: Quick! Find something else to catch the water!
sentences.CN: 快！找个别的东西来接雨水！

sentences.EN: Mummy! The thunder bangs are very loud!
It's okay, children, don't be frightened.
sentences.CN: 没事的，孩子们, 不要害怕。

sentences.EN: Let's count between each flash and bang.
sentences.CN: 让我们来算一下雷声与闪电之间的时间间隔。

sentences.EN: The higher we can count,the further away the thunderstorm is.
sentences.CN: 间隔越久说明暴风雨离我们越远。

sentences.EN: The thunderstorm has filled the garden with muddy puddles!
sentences.CN: 暴风雨过后花园里布满了泥坑！

sentences.EN: Peppa loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 佩奇喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。

sentences.EN: Everyone loves jumping up and down in muddy puddles.
sentences.CN: 大家都喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去。
它一来就会有很多泥坑！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is taking the family for a drive in the country.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸要带全家人开车在乡村玩。
来吧！大家都准备好了吗？
是的，猪爸爸，我们准备好了。

sentences.EN: You should see how messy it is inside!
sentences.CN: 你应该看看里边有多乱。

sentences.EN: Look at all this rubbish! Newspapers!
sentences.CN: 看看这些垃圾！一推报纸！

sentences.EN: We must clean the car before we go for a drive.
sentences.CN: 在我们出发之前，必须把车子清洁干净！

sentences.EN: Oh, right you are, Mummy Pig.
Mummy, can we help to clean the car?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，我们能帮忙洗车吗？

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has some warm soapy water to wash the car.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸取了些温肥皂水用来洗车。

sentences.EN: Daddy pig is washing the roof.
Mummy Pig is washing the bonnet.
George wants to wash the windows.
Poor George. Let me help you.
sentences.CN: 可怜的乔治，让我来帮你。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear! George has dropped his sponge in a muddy puddle.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕！乔治把海绵掉在泥坑里了。

sentences.EN: George, you're making the car all muddy again!
sentences.CN: 乔治，你又把车子弄脏了！

sentences.EN: I will wash the mud off.
Oh, dear! Peppa has thrown the muddy water all over the car.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕！佩奇用泥水把车洒了个遍！

sentences.EN: We can use the garden hose to clean it off.
sentences.CN: 我们用花园的水管把它冲干净。

sentences.EN: Yes! Yes! Can I hold the hose?
sentences.CN: 没错，没错。我可以拿着水管吗？

sentences.EN: Peppa holds the hose and Daddy Pig turns on the water.
sentences.CN: 佩奇拿着水管，猪爸爸打开了水龙头。

sentences.EN: Argh! Daddy Pig! Please turn off the water!
sentences.CN: 啊！猪爸爸，请把水龙头关上。

sentences.EN: At least the car has been washed.
You go and dry yourseIves while I polish the car.
sentences.CN: 你们去擦干衣服，我来擦亮车。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is polishing the car so well,he can see his face in it.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸把车擦得很干净，可以映出他的脸。
真是一辆可爱，闪闪发光的车。

sentences.EN: Yes, I am a bit of an expert at these things.
sentences.CN: 没错，我可是这方面的专家。

sentences.EN: I hope you will all keep this car clean today.
sentences.CN: 我希望你们一直能让车保持干净。

sentences.EN: Mummy, now you've made the car all muddy again.
sentences.CN: 妈妈，现在可是你把车子弄脏了。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George have come to Granny and Grandpa Pig's house for lunch.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治来到猪奶奶和猪爷爷家吃午餐。

sentences.EN: Would you like to pick some vegetables from the garden for lunch?
sentences.CN: 你们想从花园里摘些蔬菜做午餐吗？

sentences.EN: This is Grandpa Pig's vegetable garden.
He has grown all these vegetables himself!
sentences.CN: 这些蔬菜全是他自己种的！

sentences.EN: Let's choose some vegetables for lunch.
sentences.CN: 我们选些蔬菜做午餐吧。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Do you both like lettuce?
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊。你们俩喜欢吃生菜吗？

sentences.EN: Oh, dear! I must have something that George likes.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊！我一定有乔治喜欢吃的。

sentences.EN: and he does not like lettuce,
and he does not like tomatoes.
Well, George, what vegetable do you like?
sentences.CN: 好吧，乔治，你喜欢吃什么蔬菜？

sentences.EN: Silly George! Chocolate cake isn't a vegetable!
sentences.CN: 傻乔治！巧克力蛋糕可不是蔬菜！

sentences.EN: Maybe George will like the vegetables when they're made into a lovely salad.
sentences.CN: 也许乔治会喜欢吃蔬菜只要把它们做成可口的沙拉。

sentences.EN: Ooh! Lovely fresh tomatoes,lettuce and cucumber!
sentences.CN: 哦！新鲜可口的番茄，生菜和黄瓜！

sentences.EN: First, we have to wash them!
sentences.CN: 首先，我们必需要洗一下它们！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George help Granny Pig wash the vegetables.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治帮奶奶清洗蔬菜。

sentences.EN: Granny Pig has made the tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber into a salad.
sentences.CN: 猪奶奶把番茄，生菜和黄瓜制成沙拉。

sentences.EN: Grandpa Pig, can you call everyone to lunch?
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷，你可以叫大家来吃午饭吗？

sentences.EN: Granny Pig has made pizza for lunch.
made with Grandpa's tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber!
sentences.CN: 是用爷爷的番茄，生菜和黄瓜做的！

sentences.EN: But George does not like the tomatoes or the lettuce or the cucumber.
sentences.CN: 但乔治不喜欢吃番茄，生菜和黄瓜。

sentences.EN: George, just try a little bit of this lovely tomato.
sentences.CN: 乔治，尝一点这可口的番茄吧。

sentences.EN: Grandpa Pig grew it in his garden!
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷自己在花园种的！

sentences.EN: Try a piece of lettuce, George. It's yummy!
sentences.CN: 尝一片生菜吧，乔治。很好吃的！

sentences.EN: George is eating the tomatoes, lettuce and cucumber!
sentences.CN: 乔治开始吃番茄，生菜和黄瓜了。

sentences.EN: Would you like some more, George?
George, are you too full to eat any more tomatoes,lettuce or cucumber?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你是不是吃得太饱了，一点番茄，生菜和黄瓜都不能吃了？

sentences.EN: George is too full to eat any more.
sentences.CN: 乔治吃得太饱了不能再吃别的东西了。

sentences.EN: George, are you too full to eat anything more?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你是不是吃得太饱，别的都吃不下了？

sentences.EN: George is too full to eat anything more.
sentences.CN: 乔治吃得太饱，别的都吃不下了。

sentences.EN: Oh, well, then you won't want any of this chocolate cake!
sentences.CN: 哦，好的，那么你也应该吃不下巧克力蛋糕了！

sentences.EN: George seems to have got his appetite back!
sentences.CN: 看来乔治的胃口又回来了！

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family are going camping.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和家人一起去露营。

sentences.EN: this is the tent I had when I was a little boy!
sentences.CN: 这个帐篷是我小时候用过的！

sentences.EN: Daddy? How are you going to make that into a tent?
sentences.CN: 爸爸？你要怎么把它搭成帐篷？

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig, put the tent on the poles, please.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈，请把帐篷布铺到柱子上。

sentences.EN: The pegs hold the tent up.
The tent is a bit little.
It was big enough for me when I was a boy.
sentences.CN: 当我还是个小男孩时它是够用的。

sentences.EN: But it does look a bit small now...
sentences.CN: 但是现在它看起来确实有点小了。。。

sentences.EN: That's because you've grown a bit since you were a boy, Daddy Pig!
sentences.CN: 这是因为你从一个小男孩长大了，猪爸爸！

sentences.EN: And your tummy has grown the most of all!
sentences.CN: 而且你的肚子是长得最大的！

sentences.EN: Talking of tummies, we should cook supper!
sentences.CN: 说起肚子，我们应该煮晚饭了！

sentences.EN: First, we have to collect sticks to make a fire.
sentences.CN: 首先，我们必须先找些木柴来生火。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are helping Daddy Pig collect sticks for the campfire.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在帮猪爸爸找木柴用来生火。

sentences.EN: George, I'll pick up the stick sand you can carry them.
sentences.CN: 乔治，我来捡木柴，你来拿着。

sentences.EN: That's a splendid campfire! Now I'll light it.
sentences.CN: 这个篝火堆得很好！现在我来点着它。

sentences.EN: Daddy, how can you light it without matches?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，不要火柴你怎么生火？

sentences.EN: I'm going to make fire the old way,
by simply rubbing these two sticks together!
sentences.CN: 通过简单的摩擦这二根木棍！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is rubbing the two sticks together to light the campfire.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸不断地摩擦二根木棍去点燃篝火！

sentences.EN: Now we can heat up the tomato soup.
sentences.CN: 现在我们可以加热番茄汤了。

sentences.EN: Ahhh! Listen to the sounds of nature!
sentences.CN: 啊~！来听听大自然的声音！

sentences.EN: That is the sound of crickets chirping.
My tummy rumbling is one of the best sounds of nature!
sentences.CN: 我肚子的响声是大自然里最好听的一种声音！

sentences.EN: It means it's time to eat!
There's another one of Daddy Pig's sounds of nature!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸还有另外一个声音也属于大自然的！

sentences.EN: Come on, children, into the tent,it's bedtime.
sentences.CN: 来吧，孩子们，进帐篷，该睡觉了。

sentences.EN: Daddy, you're too big for the tent!
sentences.CN: 爸爸，你太胖了进不来的！

sentences.EN: Never mind, I'd rather sleep outside anyway.
sentences.CN: 没关系，我其实宁愿睡在外边。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George are sleeping in the tent.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈，佩奇和乔治睡在帐篷里。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is sleeping outside, under the stars.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸睡在帐篷外的星空下。

sentences.EN: Sleeping in the open air with the stars above me!
sentences.CN: 睡在空旷野外，上面是满天的星星！

sentences.EN: Maybe this wasn't such a good idea after all...
sentences.CN: 也许这不是一个好主意。。。

sentences.EN: Daddy! It was lovely and cozy in the tent!
sentences.CN: 爸爸！睡在帐篷里真的好舒服！

sentences.EN: He must have been cold and wet.
Peppa and George are going to bed.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治准备上床睡觉了。

sentences.EN: But maybe George is sleepy and doesn't want a story.
sentences.CN: 但也许乔治困了不想听故事。

sentences.EN: George, do you want a story?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你是不是想听故事？

sentences.EN: Alright! I will tell you just one story!
If Daddy Pig tells you a story, you must both promise to go to sleep.
sentences.CN: 如果爸爸讲完故事，你们必须保证去睡觉。

sentences.EN: Hmmm. I think I'll tell you the story of ''The Sleepy Princess''.
sentences.CN: 嗯。我讲一个叫“沉睡公主”的故事吧。
它是一个精彩的故事吗？

sentences.EN: It's not boring! It's very good!
sentences.CN: 不会无聊的！它是一个很棒的故事！

sentences.EN: Is there a little princess in it?
Peppa! If you keep talking, Daddy Pig can't start the story.
sentences.CN: 佩奇！如果你一直说话，爸爸就无法开始讲故事了。

sentences.EN: Is there a little princess in the story, Daddy?
sentences.CN: 故事里有小公主吗，爸爸？

sentences.EN: Yes, there is a little princess in it.
Once upon a time... in a castle, there lived a little princess.
sentences.CN: 很久以前。。。在一个城堡里，住了一位小公主。

sentences.EN: And she was called the Sleepy Princess.
Daddy, why was she called that?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，她为什么叫沉睡公主？

sentences.EN: She loved looking at herseIf in the mirror.
sentences.CN: 她喜欢看镜子里的自己。

sentences.EN: Who else was living in the castle?
The others in the castle were...the small Prince.
sentences.CN: 另外住在城堡里的人是。。。一位小王子。

sentences.EN: That's right! They were all living there as well.
sentences.CN: 说得对！他们全都住在城堡里。

sentences.EN: Did King Daddy have a big tummy?
sentences.CN: 国王爸爸的肚子很大吗？

sentences.EN: Of course not! He was very handsome, like me.
sentences.CN: 当然不大！他很帅气，像我一样。

sentences.EN: Anyway, there was also a dragon!
It wasn't a dragon. It was a dinosaur!
sentences.CN: 它不是龙。它是一只恐龙！

sentences.EN: Living outside was a huge, fierce dinosaur!
sentences.CN: 住在城堡外的是一只巨大，凶恶的恐龙！

sentences.EN: Oh, dear! Maybe the dinosaur wasn't quite that fierce, Daddy Pig?
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊！也许这只恐龙并没有那么凶恶，猪爸爸？

sentences.EN: Sorry, George. No, the dinosaur was very gentle.
sentences.CN: 对不起，乔治。不，那恐龙很温和。

sentences.EN: Oh, sorry. I was being the dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 哦，抱歉。我假装自己是只恐龙。

sentences.EN: Daddy, why is the princess called ''The Sleepy Princess''?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，为什么要公主被叫“沉睡公主”呢？

sentences.EN: Then the stars and moon came out.
But the most sleepy of all was the Sleepy Princess!
sentences.CN: 但感到最困的是沉睡公主！

sentences.EN: No, Daddy! I am not sleepy at all.
You'll miss the end of the story!
sentences.CN: 你会错过故事的结局的！

sentences.EN: Well, Peppa might not be sleepy,
but the Sleepy Princess certainly was.
sentences.CN: 但是沉睡公主肯定困了。

sentences.EN: Looking at herseIf all day in the mirror had completely worn her out.
sentences.CN: 她整天看着镜子里的自己，累坏了。

sentences.EN: Let's carry you to bed. Goodnight!
sentences.CN: 让我抱你去睡觉吧。晚安！

sentences.EN: The Sleepy Princess was so sleepy, she had fallen fast asleep.
sentences.CN: 沉睡公主太困了，她很快就睡着了。

sentences.EN: Thank you for that story, King Daddy!
sentences.CN: 谢谢你的故事，国王爸爸！

sentences.EN: And our little prince andprincess enjoyed it, too!
sentences.CN: 我们的小王子和小公主很喜欢这个故事！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are visiting Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治去看猪奶奶和猪爷爷。

sentences.EN: Before you come in the house, you must take off your muddy boots.
sentences.CN: 在你们进屋前，你们必须把靴子脱掉。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George,look what I've made! Little curtains!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，看我做了什么！小窗帘！

sentences.EN: What are the little curtains for, Granny?
sentences.CN: 这小窗帘是用来干什么的，奶奶？

sentences.EN: Do you want to see what Grandpa Pig has made for you, in the garden?
sentences.CN: 你们想看看猪爷爷在花园为你们做了什么吗？

sentences.EN: Look what I've made for you.
sentences.CN: 看看我给你们做了什么。

sentences.EN: A tree house! For George and me?
sentences.CN: 树屋！是做给乔治和我的吗？

sentences.EN: And the little curtains are for your tree house!
sentences.CN: 这个小窗帘是给你们的树屋做的！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love their tree house!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治很喜欢他们的树屋！

sentences.EN: Who wants to go inside first?
Before I go in my tree house, I must take off my muddy boots!
sentences.CN: 在进入我的树屋前，我得把我有泥巴的靴子脱掉。

sentences.EN: George? Would you like to go in the tree house, too?
A young pig named "George"would like to pay a visit.
sentences.CN: 有一个叫“乔治”的小猪想来拜访你。

sentences.EN: As long as he takes off his muddy boots.
sentences.CN: 只要他脱掉他有泥巴的靴子就可以。

sentences.EN: George, take your boots off,then you can visit Peppa in the tree house.
sentences.CN: 乔治，把你的靴子脱掉然后你就可以进佩奇的树屋玩了。

sentences.EN: Have you room for any more visitors?
sentences.CN: 你的树屋还能让人进吗？

sentences.EN: Hmmmm. You have to say the secret words.
Then you can come into our house.
I see. And what are the secret words?
sentences.CN: 我明白了。那秘密暗号是什么？

sentences.EN: I have to whisper them to you.
The secret words are "Daddy's Big Tummy!”
sentences.CN: 秘密暗号是“爸爸的大肚子”！

sentences.EN: I think those are silly secret words.
sentences.CN: 我觉得这个暗号有点傻。

sentences.EN: Mummy, before you come in our house,you must take off your boots.
sentences.CN: 妈妈，在你进我们屋前，你必须脱掉你的靴子。

sentences.EN: Can I have different secret words, please?
sentences.CN: 我可以说不一样的秘密暗号吗？

sentences.EN: You can come in now, Daddy!
sentences.CN: 你现在可以进来了，爸爸！

sentences.EN: Er. I don't think I can fit through the door.
sentences.CN: 呃。我想我可能进不了这扇门。

sentences.EN: That's because your tummy is too big!
sentences.CN: 那是因为你的肚子太大了！

sentences.EN: I know! Daddy Pig can climb in through the top!
sentences.CN: 我知道了！猪爸爸可以从屋顶上爬进去！

sentences.EN: Peppa, George, Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are all in the tree house!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，猪妈妈和猪爸爸全都进了树屋里！

sentences.EN: Granny, I love our tree house!
sentences.CN: 奶奶，我喜欢我们的树屋！

sentences.EN: I don't want to ever come out!
But are you sure you don't want to visit me in my house?
sentences.CN: 但你确定不想来我家来看看我了吗？

sentences.EN: Grandpa Pig and I will just have to eat my homemade cookies all by ourselves.
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷和我只好把我亲手做的饼干全吃掉了。

sentences.EN: But, if you want to come in,you have to say the secret words.
sentences.CN: 但是，如果你想进来的话，你得说秘密暗号。
那很简单了！“爸爸的大肚子！”

sentences.EN: Well, I still think that those are very silly secret words.
sentences.CN: 好吧，我仍然觉得那个秘密暗号很傻。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are having a fancy dress party.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在举行化妆舞会。
他们邀请了所有的朋友。

sentences.EN: Peppa is dressed as a fairy princess.
sentences.CN: 佩奇扮成一位仙女公主。

sentences.EN: And George is dressed as a dinosaur.
Candy Cat, Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog, Rebecca Rabbit and Pedro Pony.
sentences.CN: 小猫凯迪，小羊苏西，小狗丹尼，小兔瑞贝卡和小马佩德罗。

sentences.EN: Suzy is wearing her nurse's costume.
I'm glad the nurse has arrived!
Have you just come from the hospital?
Er, I'm not a real nurse.
I can turn you into a frog.
And what are you, Rebecca Rabbit?
There's a fairy princess and a dinosaur waiting to meet you.
sentences.CN: 里面有仙女公主和恐龙在等着你们。
你好，苏西，我是佩奇公主。

sentences.EN: You must bow when you speak to me.
Woof! Rebecca, why are you dressed as a carrot?
sentences.CN: 汪！瑞贝卡，你为什么扮成胡萝卜？

sentences.EN: Peppa is admiring herself in the mirror.
sentences.CN: 佩奇在欣赏镜子里的自己。

sentences.EN: Who is the fairest of them all?
Hello, I'm a little fairy princess.
sentences.CN: 你好，我是一个小仙女公主。

sentences.EN: And I've got a magic wand!
I've got a magic wand, too!
I can turn you into a frog.
And I'll turn you into a frog.
sentences.CN: 我也可以把你变成青蛙。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, George is scared of his own reflection.
sentences.CN: 哦，天啊，乔治被他自己的样子吓坏了。

sentences.EN: Silly George, look, it's you in the mirror.
sentences.CN: 傻乔治，看，它是镜子里的你而已。

sentences.EN: Children,it's time to decide who has the best fancy dress costume.
sentences.CN: 孩子们，是时候决定谁是在化妆舞会上装扮得最好的。

sentences.EN: maybe she should be the judge.
I'm the judge! I'm the judge!
The "judge"decides who has the best costume.
sentences.CN: “裁判”可以决定谁装扮得最好。

sentences.EN: Peppa is going to choose who has the best costume.
sentences.CN: 佩奇准备选出装扮得最好的一位。

sentences.EN: Suzy, can I see your costume, please?
sentences.CN: 苏西，我可以看看你的装扮吗？

sentences.EN: Very good, Nurse Suzy. Now, Danny!
sentences.CN: 很好，护士苏西。现在，到丹尼了！

sentences.EN: I can turn you into a frog!
Well, I'm a fairy princess and I can turn you into a frog!
sentences.CN: 好吧，我是仙女公主我也可以把你变成青蛙！

sentences.EN: And my little brother, George, is a scary dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 我弟弟，乔治，是一只恐龙。

sentences.EN: Now you say who the winner is.

sentences.CN: 佩奇你不可以选你自己的！

sentences.EN: You have to pick another winner.
Peppa and her family are going to the museum.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和家人去博物馆参观。

sentences.EN: It's a place full of interesting things that are very old.
sentences.CN: 它是一个存放古老又有趣的东西的地方。

sentences.EN: There is one room full of things that belonged to kings and queens from long ago.
sentences.CN: 有间房间放满属于很久以前的国王和王后的东西。

sentences.EN: I want to see the king and queen's room!
sentences.CN: 我想去看看国王和王后的房间！

sentences.EN: And there's another room with a real dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 另外一个房间有真正的恐龙。
两张成人票和二张儿童票。

sentences.EN: Peppa wants to see the room full of things that belong to kings and queens from long ago.
sentences.CN: 佩奇想去看放满很久以前的国王和王后的东西的房间。

sentences.EN: But George wants to see the real dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 但是乔治想去看真正的恐龙。

sentences.EN: We will see the dinosaur next.
sentences.CN: 我们接着会去看恐龙的。

sentences.EN: Peppa, these are all the things that the queen had a long time ago.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，这些东西都是很久以前国王和王后所拥有的。

sentences.EN: This is the queen's special chair.
Look, Peppa. This is the queen's golden crown.
sentences.CN: 看，佩奇，这是王后的金色皇冠。

sentences.EN: Mummy, where is the queen's television?
sentences.CN: 妈妈，王后的电视机放在哪？

sentences.EN: No, they didn't have computers, either.
What did they do all day?
Mummy, if I was the queen, I would eat as much cake as I wanted.
sentences.CN: 妈妈，如果我是王后，我想吃多少蛋糕就吃多少。
佩奇想像成为一个王后。

sentences.EN: Is there anything else you would care for, Queen Peppa?
sentences.CN: 你有什么你还想要的吗，佩奇王后？

sentences.EN: You must bow when you speak to me.
sentences.CN: 你跟我说话时必须要鞠躬。

sentences.EN: Oh! I'm most terribly sorry,your royal highness.
sentences.CN: 哦！我深感抱歉，王后陛下。

sentences.EN: Hmmm, that must be very interesting.
George! This is the dinosaur room!
I can't see him. He must be very small.
sentences.CN: 我看不到他。他一定非常小了。

sentences.EN: These are the bones of a real dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 这些都是真恐龙的骨头。

sentences.EN: George imagines being a big dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 乔治想像变成一条大恐龙。

sentences.EN: The dinosaur room is George's favorite room!
sentences.CN: 这间恐龙屋是乔治最喜欢的房间！

sentences.EN: My favorite room is the king and queen's room.
sentences.CN: 我最喜欢的是国王和王后的房间。

sentences.EN: And it looks as if Daddy Pig is already in his favorite room.
sentences.CN: 看来爸爸好像已经到了他最喜欢的房间了。

sentences.EN: The room with the cakes in.
Daddy Pig's favorite room is the museum cafe.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸最爱的房间是博物馆的餐厅。

sentences.EN: Oh, yes! This is a very nice room!
sentences.CN: 哦，是的！这真是最好的房间！

sentences.EN: The sun is shining. It is a very hot day.
sentences.CN: 太阳当空照着。天气非常炎热。
真是个不错的大热天啊！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are wearing their boots!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治穿着他们的靴子！

sentences.EN: They are going to jump in muddy puddles!
Oh, dear! The sun is so hot that the puddles have dried up!
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕！天气太热了泥坑都晒干了！

sentences.EN: The puddles are all dry and we can't jump in them!
sentences.CN: 泥坑都晒干了，我们不能跳了！

sentences.EN: It's so sunny,you can play in the paddling pool instead!
sentences.CN: 天气晴朗，你们可以在充气泳池里玩！

sentences.EN: First, you have to change into your swimming costumes.
sentences.CN: 首先，你得换上你的泳装。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are wearing their swimming costumes!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治穿上了泳装！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is wearing her swimming costume.
And Daddy Pig is wearing his swimming costume!
Because it's so hot, you need sun cream.
sentences.CN: 天气太热了，你要抹些防晒霜。

sentences.EN: Yes, we all need sun cream today.
sentences.CN: 是啊，我们今天全都要抹防晒霜。

sentences.EN: Let's get some air into this paddling pool!
Daddy Pig is pumping up the paddling pool!
sentences.CN: 爸爸在给充气泳池充气！

sentences.EN: Peppa holds the hose and Mummy Pig turns on the water.
sentences.CN: 佩奇拿着水管妈妈打开了水笼头。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love their paddling pool.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢他们的充气泳池。

sentences.EN: Ms. Rabbit, the ice cream lady!
On very hot days, Ms. Rabbit sells ice cream.
sentences.CN: 在天很热时，兔女士会卖冰淇淋。

sentences.EN: Can George and I have an ice cream, please?
sentences.CN: 乔治和我可以吃冰淇淋吗？

sentences.EN: Oh, well, I suppose it is an especially hot day.
sentences.CN: 哦，好吧，今天实在太热了。

sentences.EN: Please, can I have one as well?
Hello, Mummy Pig, Peppa and George.
sentences.CN: 你好，猪妈妈，佩奇和乔治。

sentences.EN: What ice creams would you like?
Can I have a cone, please, Ms. Rabbit?
sentences.CN: 可以给我一个冰淇淋球吗，兔女士？

sentences.EN: The same for me and one for Daddy Pig, please.
sentences.CN: 我也要一样的冰淇淋球，猪爸爸也要一个。

sentences.EN: And what would young Mr.George like?

sentences.CN: 他对什么东西都说“恐龙”！

sentences.EN: Well, it just so happens that I do have a dinosaur shaped ice-lolly!
sentences.CN: 好吧，正巧我有卖恐龙形状的冰棍！

sentences.EN: George,you should eat your ice-lolly before it melts.
sentences.CN: 乔治，你应该在冰棍融化前快吃掉它。

sentences.EN: George loves his dinosaur ice-lolly so much, he doesn't want to eat it.
sentences.CN: 乔治太喜欢他的恐龙冰棍了，他不舍得吃了。

sentences.EN: George, I really think you should eat your ice-lolly before it melts and falls on the ground.
sentences.CN: 乔治，我真的觉得你要快点吃你的冰棍不然它会融化掉到地上。

sentences.EN: Oh, dear, George's dinosaur ice-lolly has melted and fallen on the ground.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕了，乔治的恐龙冰棍融化了并且掉到地上了。

sentences.EN: You can share Daddy's ice cream.
sentences.CN: 你可以吃爸爸的冰淇淋。

sentences.EN: Let's tip water on Daddy to cool him down!
sentences.CN: 让我们把水倒在爸爸身上让他凉快凉快！

sentences.EN: You were all red and hot, Daddy Pig!
sentences.CN: 你刚才又红又热的，猪爸爸！

sentences.EN: So we tipped water on you!
Oh, I see. Thank you, Peppa.
sentences.CN: 哦，我明白了。谢谢你，佩奇。

sentences.EN: Quick, George, let's get out boots!
sentences.CN: 快，乔治，我们快去穿靴子！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are wearing their boots!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治穿上了靴子！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love the hot day.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治喜欢大热天。

sentences.EN: But most of all, they love jumping up and down in puddles!
sentences.CN: 但是最主要的是，他们喜欢在泥坑里跳来跳去！

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family are visiting Uncle Pig and Aunty Pig and Cousin Chloe.
sentences.CN: 佩奇与家人去看望猪伯伯，猪伯母和堂姐克洛伊。

sentences.EN: I expect Uncle Pig will fall asleep after lunch,like he always does.
sentences.CN: 我觉得猪伯伯会在吃完午餐后睡着他每次都这样。

sentences.EN: You shouldn't say such things about your own brother!
sentences.CN: 你不该这样说你自己的哥哥！

sentences.EN: Especially in front of the children.
Uncle Pig always eats too much lunch and falls asleep, snoring loudly! Like this.
sentences.CN: 猪伯伯总是午餐吃很多然后睡着了，（并且）打呼噜打得很大声！像这样。

sentences.EN: forget what I just said about Uncle Pig.
sentences.CN: 忘了我刚才讲伯伯的事吧。

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family have arrived at Uncle Pig and Aunty Pig's house.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和她的家人到达了猪伯伯与猪伯母的家。

sentences.EN: Hello, Aunty Pig and Uncle Pig!
Uncle Pig is Daddy Pig's brother.
sentences.CN: 猪伯伯是猪爸爸的大哥。

sentences.EN: Chloe Pig is Peppa and George's cousin.
sentences.CN: 克洛伊是佩奇和乔治的堂姐。
你好啊，佩奇！你好啊，乔治！

sentences.EN: I want to show you something!
This is my new puppet theater!
My daddy made it for me.

sentences.CN: 我已经做了二个木偶了！
你好啊！我是小猪克洛伊。

sentences.EN: And this one is my daddy.
Chloe? Can me and George make puppets, too?
sentences.CN: 克洛伊？我和乔治能不能也做个木偶呢？
克洛伊画了木偶的眼睛。

sentences.EN: George? What puppet would you like to make?
sentences.CN: 乔治？你想做怎样的木偶呢？
你问乔治什么他都会说"恐龙".
好的，一只恐怖的恐龙木偶。

sentences.EN: Chloe is making George a dinosaur puppet.
sentences.CN: 克洛伊在给乔治做恐龙木偶。

sentences.EN: After lunch, we'll do a puppet show!!
sentences.CN: 午餐后，我们来个木偶表演吧！

sentences.EN: Aunty Pig has made spaghetti for lunch!
sentences.CN: 猪伯母给大家做了意大利面做午餐！
这些意大利面很真好吃！

sentences.EN: You can tell you two are brothers!
sentences.CN: 这可以看出来你俩是兄弟！

sentences.EN: Peppa, George and I are going to do a puppet show!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治和我去准备木偶表演！

sentences.EN: Have I got time for some more spaghetti?
sentences.CN: 我还有时间再多吃点意大利面吗？

sentences.EN: Could I have some more, too?
The puppet show is about to begin!
sentences.CN: 木偶表演马上要开始了！
你们好！我的名字叫克洛伊。

sentences.EN: I think they've made my tummy a bit big.
sentences.CN: 我觉得他们把我的肚子做大了一点。

sentences.EN: Uncle Pig? Are you going to fall asleep and snore like you always do?
sentences.CN: 伯伯，你要睡着了吗会打呼噜吗？就像你以前那样。

sentences.EN: Daddy says you always fall asleep and snore loudly, like this.
sentences.CN: 爸爸说你午餐后总会睡着而且打呼声很响，就像这样。

sentences.EN: You shouldn't have said those things about Uncle Pig!
sentences.CN: 你真不该这样说猪伯伯！

sentences.EN: I don't think Daddy Pig or Uncle Pig can hear you!
sentences.CN: 我不觉得猪爸爸和猪伯伯能听见你说的话！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig and Uncle Pig have fallen asleep.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸和猪伯伯都睡着了。

sentences.EN: You can tell they are brothers!
sentences.CN: 他们俩果然是亲兄弟啊！

sentences.EN: Ugh? Has the puppet show started yet?
sentences.CN: 呃？木偶表演还没有开始吗？

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is watching a keep fit program on television.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈正在看一个健身节目。
现在一起来吧，这就对了。

sentences.EN: It's a program about doing exercises to keep fit.
sentences.CN: 这个是减肥的健身节目。

sentences.EN: You don't look very fit, Daddy.
sentences.CN: 可你看上去一点也不匀称，爸爸。

sentences.EN: Your tummy is a bit big!
I'm very fit! I'll show you!
sentences.CN: 我很匀称的！我可以给你看看！
碰一下你的脚趾。像这样！

sentences.EN: Daddy! Stop pretending that you can't touch your toes.
sentences.CN: 爸爸！不要假装碰不到你的脚趾哦。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig really cannot touch his toes.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸真的不能碰到他的脚趾。

sentences.EN: Hmmm... Maybe I should do a bit of exercise.
sentences.CN: 嗯。。。也许我应该做点锻炼了。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig! You have to start exercising now!
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸！你现在就应该开始锻炼了！

sentences.EN: Don't worry, Daddy, I will help you.
sentences.CN: 不用担心，爸爸，我会帮你的，

sentences.EN: Oh, alright! Peppa, you're in charge of getting me fit.
sentences.CN: 哦，好吧！佩奇，你负责监督我减肥。

sentences.EN: First, you must do some press-ups!
sentences.CN: 首先，你必须做些俯卧撑！

sentences.EN: Now, I want you to do...one hundred!
Come on, children, help me make lunch.
sentences.CN: 来吧，孩子们，来帮我做午餐。

sentences.EN: No, Daddy! You've got one hundred press-ups to do.
sentences.CN: 不行，爸爸！你还有一百个俯卧撑要做啊。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig, Peppa and George are in the kitchen making lunch.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈，佩奇和乔治在厨房做午餐。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is still doing his press-ups.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸仍然在做他的俯卧撑。

sentences.EN: I do hope he's not overdoing it.
sentences.CN: 我真的希望他不要做得过火了。

sentences.EN: There was something interesting on the TV.
Maybe Daddy will have more success with my old exercise bike.
sentences.CN: 也许爸爸用我的的旧健身单车效果会更好。

sentences.EN: I'll be able to cycle and watch TV at the same time.
sentences.CN: 我可以一边骑一边看电视。
我听不到电视里的声音！

sentences.EN: You've got to get fit somehow.
sentences.CN: 但是你一定得瘦下来才行。

sentences.EN: I know! You can use my bicycle.
sentences.CN: 我知道了！你可以骑我的自行车。

sentences.EN: Yes, and then you'll get some fresh air as well.
sentences.CN: 是的，而且你还可以呼吸新鲜空气。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is going to ride on Peppa's little bicycle.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸要骑佩奇的小自行车。

sentences.EN: Yes! Yes! Thank you, Peppa, I know. Bye bye.
sentences.CN: 好的！好的！谢谢你，佩奇，我知道了。再见。

sentences.EN: Getting fit is quite hard work.
Aha! Now I can get fit without having to pedal!
sentences.CN: 啊哈！现在我不用踩踏板就能瘦身了！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is going very fast.
Oh! Maybe I'd better slow down.
Arrgh! The brakes aren't strong enough!
Daddy Pig has been gone for a long time.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸已经出去很长时间了。

sentences.EN: Daddy must be really enjoying himself to be away for so long.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸一定骑得很开心所以才去了那么久。

sentences.EN: I whizzed all the way down the hill,
sentences.CN: 我一直飞速骑到山底下，

sentences.EN: and then I had to push the bike all the way back up again.
sentences.CN: 然后又把自行车推了上来。

sentences.EN: Well, at least I've done my exercise.
sentences.CN: 好吧，至少我已经做了锻炼了。

sentences.EN: You'll have to do some more exercise tomorrow.
Daddy, to get fit, you have to exercise every day.
sentences.CN: 爸爸，要减肥，你得每天都锻炼。

sentences.EN: But don't worry, Daddy,I'll make sure you do it.
sentences.CN: 但是不用担心，爸爸，我会监督你的。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are in their bedroom playing with their toys.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治在卧室里玩玩具。

sentences.EN: George, let's play dollies and dinosaurs.
sentences.CN: 我们来玩玩偶和恐龙吧。

sentences.EN: what is that? It looks like a horrible monster!
sentences.CN: 这是什么东西呀？看上去像一头恐怖的怪兽！
啊！是一头恐龙！救命啊！救命啊！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is in the sitting room, reading his newspaper.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸坐在客厅里看报纸。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig is reading her book.

sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，发生什么事了？

sentences.EN: What on earth is going on?
And look at all this mess on the floor!
sentences.CN: 你们看看地上怎么这么乱啊？

sentences.EN: Someone could trip over and hurt themselves.
sentences.CN: 一不小心就会被绊倒受伤的。

sentences.EN: Someone did trip over and hurt themselves!
sentences.CN: 确实已经有人绊倒受伤了。

sentences.EN: Come on, children,let's do a bit of tidying up.
sentences.CN: 来吧，孩子们，我们来整理一下房间。

sentences.EN: But Mummy,we're playing dollies and dinosaurs.
sentences.CN: 但是妈妈，我们正在玩玩偶和恐龙呢。

sentences.EN: You can play again when you've tidied up.
sentences.CN: 你们可以整理干净后再玩。
可是这些都是乔治东西弄乱的。

sentences.EN: So this must be one of George's lovely dresses?
sentences.CN: 那这条肯定是乔治的漂亮裙子了？

sentences.EN: Well, maybe some of the messes is mine.
sentences.CN: 好吧，可能有一些是我弄乱的。

sentences.EN: Right! I'll help George tidy and Mummy Pig can help Peppa.
sentences.CN: 好的！我来帮乔治整理妈妈帮佩奇整理。

sentences.EN: We can have a race. Girls against boys!
sentences.CN: 我们来个比赛吧。女生对男生。

sentences.EN: Good idea! Let's see who can tidy up first.
sentences.CN: 好主意！让我们来看看谁先整理完。

sentences.EN: Teddy! I've been looking for you.
Quick, Peppa! Put Teddy in your toy basket.
sentences.CN: 快点，佩奇！把泰迪放进你的玩具篮里。
好啦！现在该整理书了。这样就好了！
没错！是一本恐龙故事书。
这本是乔治的立体（弹起插画）恐龙书。

sentences.EN: Daddy, George, you've stopped tidying up!
sentences.CN: 爸爸，乔治，你们怎么停下来不整理了？

sentences.EN: Come on, George, put this back on the bookshelf.
sentences.CN: 快点，乔治，把书放回书架。

sentences.EN: Daddy, you're very slow at tidying up.
sentences.CN: 爸爸，你们整理得实在太慢了。

sentences.EN: Mummy and I are going to win.
We all win. Look how tidy the room is.
sentences.CN: 我们都赢了。看看房间现在有多干净！

sentences.EN: Mummy, now that we've tidied our room,
sentences.CN: 妈妈，现在我们把房间整理干净了，

sentences.EN: Can we play dollies and dinosaurs again?
sentences.CN: 我们可以再继续玩玩偶和恐龙吗？

sentences.EN: Yes, you can carry on with your game now.
sentences.CN: 当然，你们现在可以继续玩游戏了。

sentences.EN: Where are my dolls? Where is Mr.Dinosaur?
sentences.CN: 我的玩偶呢？你的恐龙先生呢?

sentences.EN: Oh, dear,The room is untidy again.
Well, at least it was tidy for a bit.
sentences.CN: 好吧，至少干净了那么一小会儿。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are at the playground with their friends.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治和朋友们在操场上玩。

sentences.EN: Candy Cat and Pedro Pony are on the climbing frame.
sentences.CN: 小猫凯迪和小马佩德罗在玩攀登架。

sentences.EN: Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog, and Rebecca Rabbit are playing on the slide.
sentences.CN: 小羊苏西，小狗丹尼，小兔丽贝卡正在玩滑滑梯。

sentences.EN: Peppa is playing on the swing.

sentences.CN: 妈妈，妈妈！推我一下，好不好

sentences.EN: Yes, I want to go really high.
George wants to play on the swing.
Oh, dear! Peppa has pushed George too high!
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕了！佩奇把乔治推得太高了。

sentences.EN: George does not like being up high.
Peppa! You know George is a bit scared of heights!
sentences.CN: 佩奇，你知道乔治他有点怕高的。

sentences.EN: Let's play on the climbing frame!
You are doing it all wrong!
This is the proper way to swing across!
sentences.CN: 这才是正确推秋千的方法。
大家请往后站！准备好了，开始！
我像鸟儿一样飞起来了！

sentences.EN: Peppa is stuck in the tire!
Well, it does look a bit funny.
sentences.CN: 好吧，看上去确实有点好笑。

sentences.EN: We'll have to pull you out.
Peppa's friends are helping to free her.
sentences.CN: 佩奇的朋友们都来帮忙把她拉出来。

sentences.EN: George, do you want to play on the climbing frame?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你想不想玩攀登架？

sentences.EN: The climbing frame is quite high.
George does not like being up high.
Sorry, George.Let's play on the slide.
sentences.CN: 对不起，乔治。我们一起去玩滑梯吧。

sentences.EN: Peppa loves the slide.Everyone loves the slide.
sentences.CN: 佩奇喜欢玩滑梯。每个人都喜欢玩滑梯。

sentences.EN: George wants to play on the slide.
Are you sure, George? It is a bit high.
sentences.CN: 你确定吗，乔治？这可有点高呀。

sentences.EN: Alright, I'll help you up the steps.
Oh, dear! It is a bit too high for George.
sentences.CN: 哦，天哦！这对乔治来说有点高。

sentences.EN: Don't cry, George，I'll slide down with you.
sentences.CN: 不要哭，乔治，我和你一起滑下去。

sentences.EN: Daddy, you're too big to go down the slide!
sentences.CN: 爸爸，你个头太大滑不下去的！

sentences.EN: Don't be silly, Peppa,I'm not too big.
sentences.CN: 才不会呢，佩奇，我个头不大。
看起来非常的好笑，爸爸。

sentences.EN: I suppose it is a bit funny.
sentences.CN: 我想也许真的有点好笑。

sentences.EN: We'll have to push you down.
Daddy's tummy is just like a bouncy castle!
sentences.CN: 爸爸的肚子就像一个充气城堡。

sentences.EN: George loves bouncing on Daddy's tummy.
sentences.CN: 乔治喜欢在爸爸的肚子上跳。

sentences.EN: George isn't afraid of heights anymore!
Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig have a new picture of Peppa and George.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸新拍了一张佩奇和乔治的照片。

sentences.EN: We should put this lovely, new picture on the wall.
sentences.CN: 我们该把这张可爱的照片挂在墙上。

sentences.EN: I am the DIY expert of the house.
sentences.CN: 我是这个家里动手能力最强的。

sentences.EN: Are you sure you can do it?
Of course! I'll just put a nail in the wall and hang the picture on it.
sentences.CN: 当然可以！我会在墙上钉个钉子然后把照片挂上去。

sentences.EN: I'm just off to visit Granny and Grandpa Pig.
sentences.CN: 那我就出发去看猪奶奶和猪爷爷了。

sentences.EN: And please, don't make a mess.
Daddy, can we help put up the picture?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，我们可以帮你挂照片吗？

sentences.EN: You can watch and then you'll learn how to do it properly.
sentences.CN: 你们看着然后你们就学会怎么做了。

sentences.EN: First, I need a tape measure.
That is where I'm going to put the nail.
sentences.CN: 这就是我要钉钉子的地方。

sentences.EN: Now I need a hammer and a nail.
sentences.CN: 现在，我需要一把锤子和一个钉子。

sentences.EN: Stand back, children, and watch a craftsman at work.
sentences.CN: 往后站，孩子们，看看工匠工作。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is going to knock the nail into the wall.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸要把钉子钉进墙里。

sentences.EN: Oh, it's not meant to do that.
Daddy Pig has made a big crack in the wall.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸把墙弄了一条大的裂缝。

sentences.EN: Oh, Daddy! You've broken the wall.
sentences.CN: 哦，爸爸！你把墙给弄坏了。

sentences.EN: I can still see the crack, Daddy.
sentences.CN: 我还是可以看到裂缝，爸爸。

sentences.EN: Yes, I'll just take the nail out and fill in the crack.
sentences.CN: 是呀，那我把钉子拿出来把裂缝填上。

sentences.EN: Now you really have broken the wall.
sentences.CN: 现在，你真的把墙弄坏了。

sentences.EN: Do you think Mummy will notice?
sentences.CN: 你觉得妈妈会注意到吗？

sentences.EN: Er... Yes, I think she might.
sentences.CN: 呃...是的，我想她会注意到的。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has to mend the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸必须在猪妈妈回来前将墙修好。

sentences.EN: First, Daddy Pig fills the hole with bricks.
sentences.CN: 首先，猪爸爸要先用砖填好墙洞。

sentences.EN: Next, Daddy Pig puts plaster over the bricks.
sentences.CN: 接着，猪爸爸将水泥糊在砖上。

sentences.EN: Then Daddy Pig paints the wall.
sentences.CN: 然后，猪爸爸把墙粉刷好。

sentences.EN: But look at all the mess they have made.
sentences.CN: 但是看看家里都乱成了什么样呀。

sentences.EN: We had better clean up before Mummy comes back.
sentences.CN: 我们得在猪妈妈回来前打扫干净。

sentences.EN: First, Daddy Pig quickly washes Peppa and George.
sentences.CN: 首先，猪爸爸快速地将佩奇和乔治清洗干净。
然后佩奇用吸尘器清洁了地板。

sentences.EN: And Daddy Pig tidies up the tools.

sentences.CN: 快！假装什么事都没有发生。

sentences.EN: Yes. I can see you've been doing nothing.
sentences.CN: 是的。我能看出来你什么都没有做。

sentences.EN: I thought you were going to put the picture up.
sentences.CN: 我还以为你会把照片挂起来。

sentences.EN: In all the excitement, Daddy Pig has forgotten to put the picture up.
sentences.CN: 忙了半天，猪爸爸忘了把照片挂起来。

sentences.EN: Well, I'm no expert, but I'm sure it's quite easy.
sentences.CN: 好吧，我虽然不是专家，但是我相信应该挺简单的。

sentences.EN: Hmmm... yes, that did look quite easy.
sentences.CN: 嗯。。。是的，看上去确实很容易。

sentences.EN: But when you did it, Daddy,it looked really hard.
sentences.CN: 但爸爸你这样做的时候，看上去很难。

sentences.EN: Peppa and her family are going to the beach.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和家人要去海边玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love going to the beach.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治最喜欢去海边玩了。

sentences.EN: We must be careful not to forget anything when we go.
sentences.CN: 我们一定要小心，别走的时候把东西落下了。

sentences.EN: Sunshade, beach-bag, towels, buckets and spades, and a spotty ball.
sentences.CN: 遮阳伞，海滩包，毛巾，水桶，铲子，还有一个沙滩球。

sentences.EN: Good. Now, before you start playing, you need some sun cream on.
sentences.CN: 很好。现在，在你们玩之前都得涂上防晒霜。

sentences.EN: The sun is very hot, so Peppa and George have to have sun cream on.
sentences.CN: 太阳太毒了，所以佩奇和乔治要涂上防晒霜。

sentences.EN: Let's try out this spotty ball!
sentences.CN: 让我们来玩玩这个沙滩球吧！
真是一个不错的沙滩球！

sentences.EN: George, you throw the ball and I will catch it!
sentences.CN: 乔治，你来扔球然后我来接它！

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. George is too little to catch the ball.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕了。乔治太小接不住球。

sentences.EN: Would you and Peppa like to have a paddle in the sea?
sentences.CN: 你和佩奇想去海里趟水吗？

sentences.EN: You look very smart in your water-wings, George.
sentences.CN: 乔治，你带上臂圈后看起来很可爱。

sentences.EN: Now we can play in the water.
sentences.CN: 现在我们可以下水玩了。

sentences.EN: Daddy, I love being at the beach.
sentences.CN: 爸爸，我真喜欢在海边玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George love the beach.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治很喜欢在海边玩。
大家都很喜欢在海边玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa, George, Would you like to play with your buckets and spades?
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，你们想玩水桶和铲子吗？

sentences.EN: Can we bury you in sand?
sentences.CN: 我们可以把你埋在沙子里吗？

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are burying Daddy Pig in the sand!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治把猪爸爸埋在沙子里。

sentences.EN: My head is getting a bit hot.
Can I have my straw hat?
Please, can I have my straw hat?
sentences.CN: 请问可以帮我戴草帽吗？

sentences.EN: That's nice. Maybe I'll just have a little sleep...
sentences.CN: 太棒了。也许我可以在这里小睡一会。。。
乔治，我们来搭沙滩城堡吧！

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are making sand castles!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治正在搭城堡。

sentences.EN: First, we put sand in the buckets.Like this.
sentences.CN: 首先，我们把沙铲进水桶。像这样。

sentences.EN: We turn the buckets upside down and tap them.
sentences.CN: 我们将水桶反转，轻拍一下。

sentences.EN: And lift the bucket up! Hey, presto!
sentences.CN: 然后提起来！嘿，变出来吧！

sentences.EN: Let's check that we haven't forgotten anything.
sentences.CN: 让我们来检查一下我们有没有落下了些什么。

sentences.EN: Towels, beach-bag, sunshade, and the spotty ball.
sentences.CN: 毛巾，海滩袋，遮阳伞，和沙滩球。
我觉得我们好像忘了点什么东西。

sentences.EN: Of course! We forgot the hat!
Daddy, we almost left you behind!
sentences.CN: 爸爸，我们差点把你落在沙滩上了！

sentences.EN: Well, I'm glad George remembered me!
sentences.CN: 好的，我很高兴乔治想起了我！

sentences.EN: Peppa is playing with her doll's house. George is playing, too.
sentences.CN: 佩奇在玩她的玩偶小屋。乔治也在玩。

sentences.EN: Peppa is making a tea party for the doll family.
sentences.CN: 佩奇在给玩偶之家开茶会。

sentences.EN: Here, George! I'm the Mummy and Daddy.
sentences.CN: 来吧，乔治！我来扮演妈妈和爸爸。

sentences.EN: Children! It's nearly tea time, so you must wash your hands.
sentences.CN: 孩子们！下午茶时间快到了，你们必须得洗手。

sentences.EN: George's putting the dolls to bed.
George, why are you putting the children to bed?
sentences.CN: 乔治，你为什么把孩子们放在床上？

sentences.EN: George likes putting the dolls to bed.
sentences.CN: 乔治喜欢把玩偶放在床上。

sentences.EN: Children, come down stairs right now or you won't get any cake!
sentences.CN: 孩子们，快下来，不然你们吃不到蛋糕了！

sentences.EN: He's too busy putting the dolls to bed.
sentences.CN: 他在忙着把玩偶放到床上。

sentences.EN: George! If you want to play with my doll's house, you have to help with the tea party.
sentences.CN: 乔治！如果你想玩我的玩偶小屋，你得帮忙办茶会。

sentences.EN: Here, George, you can fill the teapot with water.
sentences.CN: 来吧，乔治，你去把茶壶装满。
孩子们，现在马上下楼吧。

sentences.EN: George is going to fill the teapot with water.
sentences.CN: 乔治准备把茶壶装满水。

sentences.EN: George has found a spider in the sink.
sentences.CN: 乔治在水槽里发现了一只蜘蛛。

sentences.EN: George wants the spider to be his friend.
sentences.CN: 乔治想蜘蛛成为他的朋友。

sentences.EN: Where are all the chocolate biscuits, Daddy?
sentences.CN: 所有的巧克力饼干在哪啊，爸爸？

sentences.EN: Oh, err, I'm sorry, Mummy,I must have eaten them all.
sentences.CN: 哦，呃，对不起，妈妈，我已经吃完了。

sentences.EN: George is putting the spider to bed.
George, what is it you're doing?
You have to help me with the tea party.
Daddy! There's a spider in my bedroom!!
sentences.CN: 爸爸！有只蜘蛛在我的卧室！！

sentences.EN: Hello, George, have you seen the spider?
sentences.CN: 你好，乔治，你有没有看到蛛蛛？

sentences.EN: It's too scary. Take it away.
There's no need to be afraid, Peppa.
sentences.CN: 没有必要这么害怕，佩奇。

sentences.EN: Spiders are very, very small and they can't hurt you.
sentences.CN: 蛛蛛是非常非常小的他们不会伤害你。

sentences.EN: Daddy will take it out of the bedroom.
Woah! He's quite big, isn't he?
sentences.CN: 哦啊！他长得挺大的，是不是？

sentences.EN: Peppa feels a little bit braver.
He likes being in my doll's house.
sentences.CN: 他喜欢在我的玩偶小屋。

sentences.EN: I hear you've found a little spider.
sentences.CN: 我听说你们发现了一只小蜘蛛。

sentences.EN: I'll take him out of the bedroom so you two can play.
sentences.CN: 我会把它拿出卧室，你俩就可以继续玩了。
妈妈，他的名字叫瘦腿先生。

sentences.EN: Oh! Mr.Skinnylegs is big, isn't he?
sentences.CN: 哦！瘦腿先生很大，是不是？

sentences.EN: Peppa and George like the spider.
sentences.CN: 佩奇和和乔治喜欢这蜘蛛。

sentences.EN: George is putting the spider to bed.
He doesn't want to be in bed.
Peppa isn't afraid of the spider anymore.
We're all going to have tea with Mr.Skinnylegs.
sentences.CN: 我们准备和瘦腿先生一起用茶。

sentences.EN: You want to say ''hello'' to my daddy?
Heh, err, that's all right, Peppa.
You're not scared, are you, Daddy?
sentences.CN: 你不会害怕的，对不对，爸爸？

sentences.EN: Granny Pig and Grandpa Pig are taking Peppa and George out for a day on the river.
sentences.CN: 猪爷爷和猪奶奶要带佩奇和乔治外出去河上玩一天。
欢迎上船，我的小宝贝们！

sentences.EN: Peppa, George, let's put your life-jackets on.
sentences.CN: 佩奇，乔治，你们快穿上救生衣吧。

sentences.EN: When Peppa and George are on Grandpa Pig's boat, they must wear life-jackets.
sentences.CN: 当佩奇和乔治上猪爷爷的船玩，他们必须得穿上救生衣。

sentences.EN: On this boat, I'm the captain.
sentences.CN: 在这艘船上，我就是船长。

sentences.EN: When Captain Grandpa tells you all to do something,you must do it.
sentences.CN: 如果船长爷爷要你们去做事情，你们必须照做。
除非是一些不明智的事。

sentences.EN: Captain Grandpa never says anything silly.
sentences.CN: 船长爷爷是不会做不明智的事。

sentences.EN: Maybe you should go a little slower, Grandpa Pig.
sentences.CN: 也许你应该开慢一点，猪爷爷！
这是一个好主意，猪奶奶！

sentences.EN: I don't want to use up all my petrol.
sentences.CN: 我不想一下子把油都用完了。

sentences.EN: Grandpa, I liked it when we went fast.
sentences.CN: 爷爷，我更喜欢开得快的感觉！

sentences.EN: Don't worry, Peppa, we'll go fast later!
sentences.CN: 不用担心，佩奇，我们一会再开快点！

sentences.EN: He's taking Danny Dog out for a day on the river.
sentences.CN: 今天，他也带丹尼出来玩。

sentences.EN: Granddad Dog is Grandpa Pig's very best friend.
sentences.CN: 狗爷爷是猪爷爷是非常要好的朋友。

sentences.EN: I'm surprised your boat is still afloat,Granddad Dog.
sentences.CN: 我很惊奇你的船还能浮起来，狗爷爷。

sentences.EN: It must be almost as old as you are!
sentences.CN: 你的船和你差不多一样老了！

sentences.EN: Woof! This old boat can go faster than your rusty bucket any day,
sentences.CN: 汪！这艘老船能走得比你那个锈桶快，

sentences.EN: Alright, you old sea-dog, race you!
sentences.CN: 好吧，你这老海狗，和你比一场！

sentences.EN: You two are acting like little children!
sentences.CN: 你们俩个怎么表现得像小孩子一样！

sentences.EN: Granddad Dog called me a water-hog.
You called him a sea-dog first, Grandpa.
sentences.CN: 明明是你先叫他海狗的，爷爷！
除非他先说“对不起！”我才说。

sentences.EN: No. He's a water-hog and my boat is faster than his.
sentences.CN: 不要。他就是水猪，而且我的船就是比他的船快。

sentences.EN: Alright, sea-dog! Let's race to the next bridge!
sentences.CN: 那好吧，海狗！我们就来比赛，看谁先到达下一座桥！

sentences.EN: Catch me if you can, water-hog!
sentences.CN: 有本事就追上我呀，水猪！

sentences.EN: Sea-dog! Is that as fast as you can go?
sentences.CN: 海狗！这应该是你最快的速度了吧？

sentences.EN: Oh, dear. Grandpa Pig's boat has run out of petrol.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕，猪爷爷的船没有油了！

sentences.EN: Maybe I did go a bit too fast.
sentences.CN: 可能我真的开得太快了吧。

sentences.EN: Granddad Dog can tow us home!
sentences.CN: 狗爷爷可以拖我们回家！

sentences.EN: I'm not being towed by that sea-dog.
sentences.CN: 我可不想海狗拖我的船回家。

sentences.EN: I haven't offered to tow the water-hog.
sentences.CN: 我也没有打算要拖水猪回家的。

sentences.EN: Will you two ever grow up?
sentences.CN: 你们俩个怎么还没有长大呢？
爷爷，快跟狗爷爷说声“对不起！”。

sentences.EN: I'm sorry I called you a sea-dog.
sentences.CN: 我很抱歉，我不应该叫你海狗。
爷爷，快跟猪爷爷说声“对不起！”。

sentences.EN: I'm sorry I called you a water-hog.
sentences.CN: 我很抱歉，我不应该叫你水猪。

sentences.EN: Would you be so kind as to tow us home?
sentences.CN: 不知道你能不能拖我们回家呢？

sentences.EN: It would be my pleasure, madam!
Granddad Dog is Grandpa Pig's very best friend!
sentences.CN: 狗爷爷是猪爷爷最要好的朋友！

sentences.EN: Granddad Dog is towing Grandpa Pig's boat home.
sentences.CN: 狗爷爷拖着猪爷爷的船回家了。

sentences.EN: The main thing is I won the race.
sentences.CN: 最主要的一点是我赢了这场比赛。

sentences.EN: Peppa and George are going shopping!
sentences.CN: 佩奇和乔治一起去购物！

sentences.EN: George loves sitting in the trolley.
Daddy, can I sit in the trolley, too?
sentences.CN: 爸爸，我能也坐在推车里吗？

sentences.EN: You're too big for the trolley, Peppa.
sentences.CN: 对于推车来说你太大了，佩奇。

sentences.EN: But you can help with the shopping.
We've got four things on the list.
sentences.CN: 我们已经列了四样东西在购物清单上。
有番茄，意大利面，洋葱和水果。
佩奇和乔治都喜欢购物。
佩奇，首先，我们需要些番茄。

sentences.EN: Hmmmm! I can see them!I can see them!
Now, put them in the trolley.
sentences.CN: 现在，把他们放进推车里。

sentences.EN: Tomatoes, that's one thing off the list.
sentences.CN: 番茄，那么现在可以把它从清单里划去了。
清单里的下一样是什么？

sentences.EN: Spaghetti is Peppa and George's favorite food.
sentences.CN: 意大利面是佩奇和乔治最喜欢吃的食物。

sentences.EN: I wonder where the spaghetti is?
sentences.CN: 我想知道意大利面在哪？

sentences.EN: I can see it! This way!
Let's put this spaghetti in the trolley.
sentences.CN: 把意大利面放进推车里吧。

sentences.EN: What's next on the list, Peppa?
sentences.CN: 清单的下一样是什么，佩奇？

sentences.EN: Crisps are not on the list.
We have plenty of crisps at home, Peppa.
sentences.CN: 我们有很多薯片在家里，佩奇。

sentences.EN: George, there aren't any dinosaurs in the supermarket!
sentences.CN: 乔治，超市里可没有什么恐龙！

sentences.EN: No, George. The next thing on the list is onions.
sentences.CN: 不，乔治。清单的下一样是洋葱。
是洋葱！我现在想起来了！

sentences.EN: Very good.That's nearly everything on our list.
sentences.CN: 做得好。清单上的东西差不多都有了。

sentences.EN: There's one last thing on the list.
sentences.CN: 清单上还有最后一样东西。

sentences.EN: A plant? Is that on the list?
The last thing on the list is fruit.
sentences.CN: 清单上最后一样东西是水果。

sentences.EN: There are apples and oranges and bananas
What fruit shall we have, George?
This is the checkout where all the food is paid for.
sentences.CN: 这里是收银台，所有食物都在这里付钱。

sentences.EN: Tomatoes, spaghetti, onions, melon, chocolate cake...
sentences.CN: 有番茄，意大利面，洋葱，西瓜，巧克力蛋糕。。。

sentences.EN: Chocolate cake? Is that on the list?
sentences.CN: 巧克力蛋糕？是在清单上的吗？

sentences.EN: Peppa? Did you put the chocolate cake in the trolley?
sentences.CN: 佩奇？是你把巧克力蛋糕放进推车的吗？

sentences.EN: George? Did you put the chocolate cake in the trolley?
sentences.CN: 乔治？是你把巧克力蛋糕放进推车的吗？

sentences.EN: Well, I didn't put it in.
Er... I thought it might be nice for pudding.
sentences.CN: 呃。。。我想它配布丁吃很不错。

sentences.EN: Sorry! It just looked so delicious.
sentences.CN: 对不起！但它看上去很好吃。

sentences.EN: Oh, let's pretend it was on the list.
sentences.CN: 哦，让我们假装它也在清单上。

sentences.EN: It is very early in the morning.
George! Wake up! It's my birthday!
sentences.CN: 乔治！起床！今天是我的生日。

sentences.EN: I'm going to have a party!
sentences.CN: 我要举办一个生日派对！

sentences.EN: And Daddy is doing a magic show!
sentences.CN: 爸爸还会进行魔术表演哦！

sentences.EN: Quick, George! Let's wake Mummy and Daddy up!
sentences.CN: 快，乔治！我们去叫醒爸爸妈妈！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig and Daddy Pig are still fast asleep.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈和猪爸爸现在还在睡觉。

sentences.EN: Wake up, it's my birthday! Wake up!
sentences.CN: 起床啦，今天是我的生日！起床啦！

sentences.EN: It's five o'clock in the morning.
Yes! The whole day is going!
Ok, Let's get your birthday started!
sentences.CN: 好的，我们开始庆祝你的生日吧！

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig, Daddy Pig, and George are giving Peppa her birthday present.
sentences.CN: 猪妈妈，猪爸爸和乔治把生日礼物送给了佩奇。

sentences.EN: I can put it on Teddy!
I didn't know Teddy was a girl teddy.
sentences.CN: 我不知道佩奇原来是个女孩。

sentences.EN: Oh, Daddy, of course Teddy's a girl.
sentences.CN: 哦，爸爸，泰迪当然是个女孩。

sentences.EN: Do you know what's happening next, Peppa?
sentences.CN: 你知道接下来有什么节目吗，佩奇？

sentences.EN: Yes, my friends are coming for my birthday party, and Daddy is doing a magic show!
sentences.CN: 知道，我的朋友们会来参加我的生日派对，爸爸还会表演魔术！

sentences.EN: No one will know the magician is your daddy.
sentences.CN: 没有人会知道魔术师是你爸爸。

sentences.EN: You will introduce me as, ''The Amazing Mysterio!''
sentences.CN: 你介绍我的时候就说是“传说中的神秘人”

sentences.EN: Daddy's been practicing his magic tricks all week!
sentences.CN: 爸爸一整个礼拜都在练习他的魔术！

sentences.EN: Candy Cat, Suzy Sheep, Danny Dog, Rebecca Rabbit and Pedro Pony.
sentences.CN: 小猫凯迪，小羊苏西，小狗丹尼，小兔瑞贝卡和小马佩德罗。

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig is going to do a magic show!
Peppa, remember what you have to say
''Ladies and gentlemen, introducing the Amazing Mysterio!!''
sentences.CN: “女士们，先生们，这位是传说中的神秘人！”

sentences.EN: Ladies and gentIemen. Um. It's Magic Daddy!!!
sentences.CN: 女士们，先生们，这位是神秘的爸爸！
我的第一个魔术！变~变~变~！

sentences.EN: For my next trick, I need a helper from the audience.
sentences.CN: 下一个魔术，我需要一个观众帮忙。

sentences.EN: Young lady, you put your hand up first.
sentences.CN: 小姑娘，你是第一个举手的。

sentences.EN: Can you tell the audience your name?
sentences.CN: 你能向观众介绍你的名字吗？

sentences.EN: Okay, Suzy. Here are three balls.
sentences.CN: 好的，苏西。这里有三个球。

sentences.EN: A red one, a blue one and a yellow one.
sentences.CN: 一个红色的，一个蓝色的和一个黄色的。

sentences.EN: You have to secretly choose one while my back is turned.
sentences.CN: 当我转过身去时，你要悄悄地选一个球。
变~变~变~变~！你选的。。。是黄色球！

sentences.EN: Would you like one more trick?
sentences.CN: 你们还想再看一个魔术吗？
闭上你们的眼睛，不准偷看哦！
太棒了！我的香蕉生日蛋糕！

sentences.EN: This is my best birthday ever!
sentences.CN: 这是我过得最棒的生日了！

sentences.EN: Mr.Zebra, the postman,is delivering a parcel to Peppa's house.
sentences.CN: 邮递员斑马先生正在给佩奇家送包裹。

sentences.EN: Look! I just got a parcel in the post!
sentences.CN: 瞧！我刚收到一个邮差送来的包裹！
有谁可以猜到里面是什么？

sentences.EN: Oh, George! You always say ''dinosaur'' for everything!
sentences.CN: 哦，乔治！你总是将所有的东西都说是“恐龙”！

sentences.EN: The parcel is far too small to have a dinosaur inside!
sentences.CN: 这包裹这么小恐龙怎么可能在里面！

sentences.EN: Hmmm... I think it's a new toy!
sentences.CN: 嗯。。。我想它是一个新玩具！

sentences.EN: A new toy for Daddy Pig!
We can make movies with it and watch them on our television!
sentences.CN: 我们可以用它来拍影片然后在电视里看！

sentences.EN: Can I use it first, Daddy?
sentences.CN: 我可以第一个用吗，爸爸？

sentences.EN: It's a bit too difficult for children to use.
sentences.CN: 对孩子来说，用起来有点困难哦。

sentences.EN: Even I need to read the instructions!
sentences.CN: 就算是我，也需要看说明书！

sentences.EN: Hmmm. It's a bit harder than I thought.
sentences.CN: 嗯。它比我想的要难一点。

sentences.EN: Suzy Sheep's mummy has a movie camera.
sentences.CN: 苏西的妈妈就有一台摄像机。

sentences.EN: She switches it on like this.
Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000!
I am eager and ready to shoot your first movie.
sentences.CN: 我迫不及待想帮您拍第一部影片了.哔-哔-！

sentences.EN: Is there a way to turn that voice off ?
sentences.CN: 有没有方法把这个声音关掉呢？

sentences.EN: Thank you for purchasing the movie 3000!
On Suzy's camera, you just press this button to stop it talking.
sentences.CN: 苏西家的摄像机，你只要按这个按钮，就可以让它停止说话了。

sentences.EN: Maybe we should film something new!
sentences.CN: 也许我们该拍些新东西了！

sentences.EN: I know! Daddy Pig must leave the room
sentences.CN: 我知道！猪爸爸你先离开这房间

sentences.EN: and we'll make a movie to show him!
sentences.CN: 我们会拍段影片给你看！

sentences.EN: Daddy Pig has to wait in the kitchen while Mummy Pig, Peppa and George make a secret movie!
sentences.CN: 当猪妈妈佩奇和乔治拍摄影片的时候猪爸爸得在厨房等。

sentences.EN: We must all have to do something.
George? Do you want to go first?
Can I come in and see the movie?
sentences.CN: 我可以进来看影片了吗？

sentences.EN: Finished! You can come in now!
sentences.CN: 完成了！你现在可以进来了！

sentences.EN: George has made a movie and so has Peppa!
sentences.CN: 乔治拍了一段影片，佩奇也是！
让我们来先看看乔治的影片！

sentences.EN: George is pretending to be a dinosaur.
sentences.CN: 乔治假装自己是一只恐龙。
那的确是一个很吓人的恐龙。

sentences.EN: that's not a real dinosaur on TV, it's you!
sentences.CN: 在电视里的不是真恐龙，是你！
现在，让我们来看看佩奇的影片。

sentences.EN: Who is that meant to be?
My tummy is very big, because I eat a lot of cookies!
sentences.CN: 我的肚子非常大，因为我吃了太多的饼干！
我的肚子一点也不大啊！

sentences.EN: But it is true that I like cookies.
sentences.CN: 不过我喜欢吃饼干是真的。

sentences.EN: And the more you eat, the bigger your tummy gets!
sentences.CN: 而且你越吃越多，你的肚子就越变越大！

sentences.EN: This is my sweet little brother, George.
sentences.CN: 这是我可爱的小弟弟，乔治。

sentences.EN: And this is the real Daddy Pig.
sentences.CN: 而这个就是真正的猪爸爸。

sentences.EN: Peppa's playgroup are going to put on a play.
sentences.CN: 佩奇的幼儿园要演舞台剧了。

sentences.EN: All the children have parts in the play.
They have to practice at home.
Peppa is going to be the Little Red Riding Hood.
sentences.CN: 佩奇要饰演的是小红帽。

sentences.EN: Mummy Pig has made her costume.
Daddy Pig is helping Peppa practice.
sentences.CN: 猪爸爸正在帮佩奇练习。

sentences.EN: Okay, Peppa, what do you say?
I'm going to visit my grandma!"
I'm going to visit my grandma!
Danny Dog is going to play the Big Bad Wolf.
Granddad Dog and Mummy Dog are helping him practice.
sentences.CN: 丹尼的爷爷和妈妈正在帮他练习。

sentences.EN: You should be a bit scarier.
sentences.CN: 你应该表现得吓人一点。

sentences.EN: I'm going to eat you all up!
Pedro Pony is going to play the Hunter.
sentences.CN: 小马佩德罗来扮演猎人。

sentences.EN: He will rescue Peppa from the Big Bad Wolf.
sentences.CN: 他会从大灰狼手中拯救佩奇。

sentences.EN: Neigh, you say,"I'm going to chase you away, you Big Bad Wolf!"
sentences.CN: 嘶~，你要说“我要把你赶跑，你这坏蛋大灰狼！”

sentences.EN: Rebecca Rabbit is going to be the Grandma.
sentences.CN: 小兔瑞贝卡要扮演奶奶。

sentences.EN: At the start of the play, you get locked in a cupboard by the Big Bad Wolf.
sentences.CN: 这出戏的开始，你被大灰狼锁进了柜子里边。

sentences.EN: Then, right at the end of the play, you are rescued by the Hunter.
sentences.CN: 然后，在剧的最后，你被猎人拯救了。

sentences.EN: Everyone has come to see the school play!
sentences.CN: 大家都来看学校舞台剧了。

sentences.EN: Ladies and gentlemen, welcome to our play,
sentences.CN: 女士们，先生们，欢迎来看我们的舞台剧，

sentences.EN: First, let us meet the actors!
sentences.CN: 首先，请我们的演员上台！

sentences.EN: Please, please! For the sake of the actors,
sentences.CN: 各位，各位！为了我们的小演员好，
我们的戏剧现在正式开始！
但是是谁来看望奶奶呢？

sentences.EN: Woof woof! I'm the Big Bad Wolf.
Oh, dear. Danny has forgotten what he says next.
sentences.CN: 哦，糟糕了。丹尼忘记了下一句该说什么了。

sentences.EN: Grandma, you must go in the cupboard.
sentences.CN: 奶奶，你得躲进柜子里边去。

sentences.EN: The Big Bad Wolf is pretending to be Grandma!
sentences.CN: 现在大灰狼假装自己就是奶奶了！

sentences.EN: I am Little Red Riding Hood.
I'm going to visit my grandma.
Daddy! You must not take photos!
sentences.CN: 爸爸！你不能在这里拍照片！

sentences.EN: I'm going to visit my grandma.
Oh. You don't look like my grandma.
sentences.CN: 哦。你看上去不像是我的奶奶啊。

sentences.EN: You are the Big Bad Wolf!
Just in time! Pedro the Hunter!
sentences.CN: 来得很及时啊！猎人佩德多！

sentences.EN: Just in time! Pedro the Hunter!
sentences.CN: 来得很及时啊！猎人佩德多来了！

sentences.EN: Pedro, would you like me to come on with you?
sentences.CN: 佩德罗，需要我跟着你吗？

sentences.EN: You are a very naughty wolf.
sentences.CN: 你真是一只顽皮的大灰狼。

sentences.EN: You were almost as good as me.
sentences.CN: 你演得几乎跟我一样好。
